1a1(rgyud 'grel): rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung bzhugs so// /
1b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ dekrAmA tat+ka b+hA ba san+d+ha nA muShA
1b2(rgyud 'grel): sad+d+ha n+ya/ bod skad du/ rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid
2a1(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa zhes bya ba'i zhal gyi lung / thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan pa de rdzogs zab gsal
2a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med 'od zer ldan// de yi rang bzhin zhi ba bcu drug phyed cha 'bar// don dam snying po de ston bla ma gsum po rab/ de la
2a3(rgyud 'grel): bya byed gsum mnyam pa yis rtag tu 'dud// 'jig rten gsum gyi sgron ma kun gyis rab bsngags pa// chos rnams kun gyi
2b1(rgyud 'grel): snying po dngos po'i de bzhin nyid// srid pa'i dug chu zlog byed gsum khong dam steng 'bar// 'jam dbyangs bla ma'i lung gis rtogs phyir bshad par bya// dbus kyi yul
2b2(rgyud 'grel): chen kha bir grong khyer rdo 'jog tu// bzang po seng ge zhes byar grags pa rab thob pa// bla ma de ni mnyes lung thob gzhung mang thos// de la rnam dpyad rig 'byung shin
2b3(rgyud 'grel): lhur// ston po shes gnyen zhes bya rigs can de yo dor// blun thos rab tu byed pa phyogs 'ga' rlom byed pa'i// byed pas der gnas rnams le gtsu
2b4(rgyud 'grel): des phan gdags par// bsams nas der gnas rtsom dang ston sogs rab tu bya// de nas ston kun 'byung skyon yul du bgred// 'dze sgeg rdo rje zhes byar mtshan gsol
3a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu grags// de la mang thos rnam par dpyad cing de nyid du// gu ne ru grags bla ma de yang mnyes byas te// lung thob gnas de'i byang phyogs cha ba sgo bdag/ dza thig ji l-i zhes bya'i bu mo bcu drug pa// lak+Sh+mI chen
3a2(rgyud 'grel): mo mnyes byas zla ba brgyad kyi bar// de yi lung ni rab thob gnon gnas grub pa thob// de nas dzA lAn+d+ha rar grong khyer ko no dzor// phyin nas 'ba' mo pa ta zhes byar grogs pa rab thob gang // mnyes byas gzhung thos lung ni mong du thos gyur nas// /
3a3(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs na mkha'i shing ldan kong ka na ru bgrod// grub pa'i dbang phyug pA li pa tAr rab grags pa// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa slob ma'i tshogs dang rab tu bcas// de kun yo byad gos zas nor rgyun gyis sbyor ba// bla ma dam pa de drung lo dgu rab tu
3a4(rgyud 'grel): btud// 'dus pa'i rgyud chen 'grel bcas bco brgyad rab tu mnyan// bdag gis ma rtogs bla ma chen pos de bzhin gsungs// 'dir ma rtogs par gzhan ni don med par bsdams nas// glegs bam mgul btags byung phyogs yul du rab bgrod
3a5(rgyud 'grel): de/ rdo rje gdan rgyab ku pa tsA zhes bya ba'i tshal// stag dang dred sogs mang zhing shin tu 'jigs pa'i sngar// zla ba drug gnas pa yi chos rnams de nyid rtogs// sprul pa'i dge slong bla ma gnyis dang bcas dang phrad// mgo dang lag gnyis yol dang
3a6(rgyud 'grel): tshechos brgyad rgyal la bab// ston zla ra ba'i tho rangs skya rengs shar dus su// 'jam pa dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sprul pa la// bdag gis don 'di blang phyir gsol ba rab tu gdab// khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab ste yum yang
3b1(rgyud 'grel): yin// khyod kyi.a bdagu la sogs te 'jogs pa tshe las skyongs// 'gro ba'i dbang po rdzob du mthong sa sprug bsngal sol// khams gsum stong bye rgya pa ma khyod sgrub spyongs// thog ma me khyod ma smra pa'i steng ma med// rnga bdun yig ming 'du
3b2(rgyud 'grel): rab dga' bde gtong byed// 'gro la phan phyir bde bas sangs rgyas rnams kun la// rab dgyes bde ba'i mgon chen khyod kyis gtong bar mdzod// skyon gyis ma gos blo na med pa'i byang chub lam// sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad skom pa ngoms mdzad
3b3(rgyud 'grel): cing // 'khor pa cwa klong thar mdzad bde la 'god mdzad pa// dngos kun rgyal bas mi dpogs lam 'di bstan par mdzod// zhi ba'i zhi ba rdul dang rab bral 'jungs pa spangs// bsgom pa las 'das mkha' 'dra dri mas ma gos pa// sgyu ma kun 'das 'dod pa
3b4(rgyud 'grel): kun la rgyab kyi phyogs// de 'dra'i rje btsun khyod la dag ni skyabs su mchi// dregs med 'jigs med byang chub chen po thob kyi bar// 'khor bar 'tsho bar 'jig rten dmyal rtsub ma lhung bar// khyod gsungs dam tshig sdom pa mthun mong ma yin rnam
3b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag la sogs pas rtag tu rab tu bskyang bar bgyi// gor chen rnam par rol pas gar mdzad cing // sna tshogs phyag ni bcu dang bsgrims pa yis// pad+ma lo ma 'jam pa brgyad phye nas// gnyis meng bde rgyu rdo rje bzhag par mdzod// gsang
3b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i de nyid mi nyams gsal bar 'gyur// rdo rje 'dab skyes zla ba'i yang dag 'du// thabs shes las byung chos kun de nyid mchog/ rje btsun bdag la phani phyir sbas pa shod// de nas 'jam dbyangs byang chub sems dpa' chen po yis// bdag
4a1(rgyud 'grel): la 'dzum pa'i bzhin bltas legs zhes lan gsum gsungs// rol pa'i gar dang chos kun de bzhin nyid// sgra brnyan lta bur rdo rje glu yis bdag la bstan// a bi yaM raM baM laM hUM/ a la la la ho/ rje btsun thugs rje che rnam
4a2(rgyud 'grel): gyis// 'di rtogs pa yis bde gshegs kyi// phun sum tshogs pa 'thob 'gyur ba'i// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pas snod 'ga' la// gsungs shing gsung dang gsung 'gyur ba// yang dag don rab rab rtogs phyir//
4a3(rgyud 'grel): yis khyod la bstan par bya// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis// chos rnams gzugs la sogs pa rnams// kun mkhyen par gyi rang bzhin ni// na mkha'i dkyil ltar rnam dag pa'i// zab gsal gnyis med ye shes te//
4a4(rgyud 'grel): de ni dngos med bsgom dngos med// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'i// khams dang skye mched kyis ma zin// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag pa na mkha' bzhin// med pas chos rnams mtshan nyid spangs// chos dang
4a5(rgyud 'grel): chos nyid yang med de// dngos po med pas mkha' dang mtshungs// tshig dang yi ge kun las grol// de ni dus dang phyogs rnams dang // chos kun gyi ni ngo byor song // lus ma yin+ya te ngag dang ni// yid kyang ma yin 'dod khams dang // gtsug/
4a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs med khams ma yin// 'byung chen bzhi yang ma yin te// de bas de ni gang na yang // mi gnas pas na mnyam pa nyid// de 'dra rdo rje 'chang chen po// chos rnams kun gyi chos nyid mchog/ thabs kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos//
4b1(rgyud 'grel): brtags pa kun las rab dben pa// phun sum tshogs sgyu dpag dka' ba// phyag rgya chen por rab snang ba'i// zar gyis rang nyid smin byed pa// de gnyis med pa'i rang bzhin mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos kyang // brjod du med pa'i sku chen po//
4b2(rgyud 'grel): de nyid rgyal sras zhing bcas dang // srid gsum rgyu dang mi rgyur bcas// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid de// dngos kun gtso bo rang sems kyis// ngo bo nyid de de rtogs na// sangs rgyas byang chub de nyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang de nyid do// /
4b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung tshan rnams kyang de nyid do// ci yi phyir na chos thams cad// sems la gnas te de nyid kyang // na mkha' la gnas na mkha' ni// gang du mi gnas 'od gsal ba// gzod nas rnam dag stong pa'o// sangs rgyas mya ngan 'das pa'i kham//
4b4(rgyud 'grel): skye med rdo rje mngon byang chub// bder gshegs kun gyi snying po mchog/ gnyis med rtog bral don chen te// rim pa gnyis par rab tu bshad// de 'dra'i don des dngos po kun// rnam par khyab te rnam gnas kyang // thog med dus nas de las
4b5(rgyud 'grel): kyang / rnam rtog chen po tshul byung ste// de la yang ni 'byung ba che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid byung ste// de las kyang ni me yi khams// chen po byung nas khyab mdzad de// de las chu khams chen po yang // byung ste khyab mdzad de las kyang // sa byung
4b6(rgyud 'grel): bzhi bsdus ngo bo las// ri sogs sems can thams cad kyang // sna tshogs phra ba sbom po dang // skyes pa bud med ma ning dang // gzhon nu dang ni rgan po dang // lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang // gdon dang skar ma gshin rje dang // mu bdag ba
5a1(rgyud 'grel): byin dmyal ba dang // yi dgas dud 'gro dang de kun// spangs dang shes tsam rab brten pa'i// 'gro ba kun tu rgyas par gnas// de bas dri yi gong ma yis// gnyis med rtog bral rab bsgribs te// ma rtogs pas na 'gro
5a2(rgyud 'grel): ba kun// 'khor ba rab tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal che// dug chu lta bu 'khrul pa yis// rnam bsgrubs thag pa'i sbrul lta bur// snang zhing med pa nyid du 'dod// de bas gnyis med don chen po// rang rig dkyil 'khor chen
5a3(rgyud 'grel): po mchog/ rgyun dang rnam grangs kyis gnas pas// de yi ngo bo rtogs par bya// gang zhig de rtogs rab 'dun pa// sems kyi smon lam yang dag can// sngon du bsod nams mthu bskyed dang // skyes bu yang dag bzhi la brten// spro dang gus dang
5a4(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen bkur dang // 'dun par ldan zhing sgom pa dang // brtan po som nyi rnam spangs pa// rjes mthun gtong phong des shes 'gyur// de yis rje btsun yang dag pa// mchog gi gangam ngag rgyud la ldan// theg chen lam gyi spyod pa dang // bsgom pa
5a5(rgyud 'grel): la ni lhur len dang // de nyid bcu la sogs pa yi// gsang dang rab gsang shin tu gsang // shes shing de yi don gab tA ra// sde/ byed bla ma mnyes par bya// yul dang mkhar dang khyim dang rta// glang po che sogs mal stan dang // chung ma sdug
5a6(rgyud 'grel): dang yid 'ong bu// bu mo sring mo che mo sogs// gzhan yang gser dang dngul gyi rdzas// zangs lcags sogs las byas pa yi// mdzes pa'i rdzas dang mu tig gi/ phreng dang pad+ma rA ga dang // pu shar in+d+ra nI la dang // mar gang g.yu sogs mchod pa'i
5b1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs// zhing 'di mkhas pas rab bkang ste// de 'dra'i rje btsun dbang po mchod// gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa// gzhan du rig par mi 'gyur bas// bud med sgyu ma'i phyag rgya nI// sgyu ma kun las khyad par 'phags// sgyu ma de yang 'jig rten 'dis
5b2(rgyud 'grel): spyan la sogs par rnam dag pas// rigs ni rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te// ming dang mtshan nyid bshad par bya// ka ma li dang shang ki ni// tsi tra nI dang ha sti ni// dang po klu mo rigs yin te// gnyis pa stag dang seng ge'i rigs// gsum pa ri dgas
5b3(rgyud 'grel): kyiSh+Tha tshogs// bzhi pa glang po che rigaso// de la ka ma li yi ni// dbyibs dang mtshan nyid bstan par bya// bu mo pad+ma'i dri bro zhing // ngo zlum sna rtsi til 'dra ste// se mo dmar zhing rgyu bskur dang // rkang mthil kun gyis sa la reg/ bA spu 'khyil ldan se
5b4(rgyud 'grel): mo canaTadakar 'chang til gyi 'bras bu 'dra// gsus pa'i gnyer ma gsum ldan zhing // brang mdzes glang chen ltar 'gros dang // rAk+ta'i ro ni sbyar ba'o// sha mdog dmar te lha mo 'di// mA ma kI yis rnam par dag/ shang ki nI yoM mtshan nyid
5b5(rgyud 'grel): dang // dbyibs nI khyod la bstan par bya// bu mo ba tshA dri bro zhing // sgra ni ring zhing sna yang ring // dkar 'chang mngag 'dra ba// 'o ma zho la rab tu sreng // rAk+ta'i ro ni mngar ba'o// mdog ni dkar ser gnas pa yi// gos dkar mo yis rnam par
5b6(rgyud 'grel): ngag/ de bzhin tsi tra ni yi ni// dbyibs dang mtshan nyid bshad par bya// bu mo sha rlon dri bro zhing // lus chung brla ni shin tu mdzes// dkar 'chang shing thog pa la 'dra// ngo tsha med cing khro 'dod pa// rtag tu 'thab mo dag la dga'// rje ngar bya rog da
6a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dra zhing // mchu 'phyang gan rkyal du nyal ba// phug ron skad 'dra sha mdog ni// sngo bsangs rAk+ta'i ro tsha ba'o// de ni lha mo sgrol mas ngag/ hasti ni yi mtshan nyid dang // dbyibs ni nga yis bstan par bya// bu mo chang gi dri bro zhing // byin sbom sna ni
6a2(rgyud 'grel): cung zad yo// dri nga zhing ni lus sbom dang // spyod pa rtsing zhing mdog rdul skya// dkar 'chang g.yas g.yon du dgye ba// sha mdog skrag cing rAk+Sha ro// bsngal zhing de 'dra'i bu mo ni// sangs rgyas spyan mas dag pa'o// da ni de dag thams cad kyi// rung dang mi rung
6a3(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa bstan// rol tshe rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang // khong du dga' zhing tshig mang dang // bsgo ba bzhin du bka' yang gcog/ 'o byas kha ni 'phyi byed de// bla ma'i yon tan shes 'gyur yang // gzhan du de la cung zad bsnyad// bla ma ma mthong ltar byed cing // /
6a4(rgyud 'grel): 'ongs kyang de la phyag mi 'tshal// rje btsun de dang mi mthun pa'i// mi gzhan dang ni rtse dga' byeng // de sogs rab tu mi ru ste// mkhas pas rab tu spang bar bya// rung ba 'di ni mkhas pas btsalnga// mig gi rtsa mdangs mig rtsa rgod// slar zhing
6a5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig bsam pa dang // skad cig rgod pa'i 'phro bzhag nas// bsam zhing yang na smra 'am 'dzum// rje btsun bla ma mthong gyur na// dga' zhing mdzes lta 'dzum par byed// de yi bka' stsal nyan zhing mos// sdig pa'i tshul gyis zhesar ldan//
6a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhan du de la snyan par brjod// de mthong 'grogs la 'khyud cing bsnyen// phag du 'a khri zhing sor tshig nyed// sgra ni bkrol nas slar 'ching byed// gos 'chos shing ni bar bar 'dzum// bla ma ma mthong ltar byed cing // gos 'chos pa dang lus nyed
6b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / rkang pas sa la 'dud cing 'bri// dus pa'i kha la 'o byed cing // nu ma ston cing ske rags 'grol// rje btsun de yis ma mthong na// glu dbyangs len cing mthong bar byed// de ni gang na gnas pa der// don med bsnyad kyis 'gro ba dang // drag tu gagong mos rab
6b2(rgyud 'grel): stegs te// lu zhing glal ba ltar byed cing // mi mo 'di yang bstan par byed// da ni gsang gnas dbyibs kyis ni// mtshan nyid rung dang mi rung ba// nga yis yang dag bstan par bya// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan par gyis// gyo mo lta bu kha sbu ba dang // zhung
6b3(rgyud 'grel): ring shin tu mi sdug dang // rtag tu skam por gnas pa dang // rtag tu zil pa 'dzag pa dang // sprul pa'i rgyab ltar rtsub pa yi// gnas ni spang bya mi rung ngo // rus sbal rgyab ltar 'phang mtho zhing // steng mnyam shin tu 'jam po dang // ba lang gi ni
6b4(rgyud 'grel): lhag pa ltar// steng mnyam thog gi dbyibs kyang ring // pad+ma'i snying po bzhin du zlum// cung zhig 'dzag min cung zang 'byung // swA nyung sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ni// mkhas pas thabs kyis shin tu btsal// mtshan nyid de dang mi ldan yang // rigs drang
6b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs dang lang tshor ldan// rgyun mdzes yid 'ong bu mo ni// longs spyod gsum ldan gzung bar bya// chos ri pa la sa sems dang ni// las 'brel gyis 'khyud ma byas dang // sngon gsungs grogs kyis shes bslus pa'i// mi mo yang ni
6b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhas pas bsgrub// de ltar de sogs bud med kyi// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya chen pos ni// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba'i// lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba bsgrub// de yang thun mong dang bcas pa// tshogs kyi mchod pa yang byas te// gong gsangs bu
7a1(rgyud 'grel): ma btsal nas kyang // bla ma la ni dbul bar bya// de nas bla ma da mnyes nas// de dang snyoms par zhugs pa yis// bde gshegs zhu gyur bcu drug char// gyur pa slob ma'i kha ru lhung // ltung bas snying gi pad+mar zhugs// de yis zhing na
7a2(rgyud 'grel): ngag byas te// chos kun sgyu ma la sogs pa'i// bcu gnyis don du rtogs par 'gyur// de las de la rang 'byung gi/ chos sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa// lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba ni// rtog bya'i cheng du bu mo byin// lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun// sems
7a3(rgyud 'grel): chen khyod kyis 'dod pa gyis// yid 'ong bu mo 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis spyod du snang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lo cho ga yis// bu mo sgrol byed dga' byin ma// byang chub chen po bsgrub pa'i phyir// khyod kyis bde chen myong bar gyis// gzhan gyis
7a4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas mi nus pa// bu mo 'di ni yang dag mchog/ de bas mtha' med 'khor ba'i bar// khyod kyis 'di dang bral mi bya// de nas sems chen de yis ni// yid 'ong bu mo blangs byas te// de yis dam tshig sdom pa'i mchog/ tshig 'dis rab tu smra bar
7a5(rgyud 'grel): glu smros shig bu khyod rdo rje can// sha khrag khu ba lnga sogs pa// dri chen dri chu sogs za 'am// b+ha ga 'o byed mi rtog gam// gzungs mang la khyod brod ngam// de yis bzhad god dang ldan par// kye/ lha mo tsau phyir bdag mi brong // dri chen dri chu sogs
7a6(rgyud 'grel): za'o// lha mo khyod la bkur sti dgos// b+ha ga 'o byed nga mi rtog/ de nas bu mos gzha phud// pad+ma gsal bstan tshig 'dis bstod// e ma ho bdag gi pad+ma 'di// bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa// cho ga'i rim pa gang gis sbyang // de yi mdun na rtag tu gnas// don
7b1(rgyud 'grel): byed pad+ma dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas// rang 'byung bde ba chen po ni// 'di na rtag par bzhugs pa yin// b+haM dza mok+Sha ho/ de nas rang gi sa bon las// 'od zer stug pos nang gsal nas// lha yi 'khor lo chags byas nas//
7b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nang nas phyir byung ste// pad+ma'i nang du zhugs byas nas// rig ma'i lha yi 'khor lo rnams// chags pa chen po bskyed nas kyang // zhal nas zhal zhugs 'khor lo rnams// chags tshon bskyed nas rdo rjer phyung // sngon bzhin zhugs sogs rab byas pa/
7b3(rgyud 'grel): yang nas yang du lha dkyil 'khor// yid kyis shin tu chags par bya// de nas 'dod pa'i sgyu ma'i tshig/ brjod pas bu mo chags par bya// gnyis su med pa bde ba chen po mchog/ lha mo khyod ni sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ste// zhal bzang khyod ni nga dang lhan cig/
7b4(rgyud 'grel): tu// rnam par rtsen pas mkha' 'dra myong bar bya// des kyang sgyu ma lta bu yis// 'dod pa'i tshig gis gsol btab nas// bdag nyid chags pa chen po yang // bskyed nas rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal// bde mchog rgya chen bdag la dgongasu gsol// bsam
7b5(rgyud 'grel): mi khyab pa'i bde chen dag dang ldan// mi g.yo tshig dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas// bdag la khyod kyis rol cig bzhes su gsol// ngo mtshar che ba'i rol pas snang mdzad cing // byang chub snying por 'gro'i lam mchog 'di// rgyud rnams yang dag
7b6(rgyud 'grel): gang la mi brten pas// bde chen yid 'ong ba yis grol bar gyis// he ho ho/ rol cig rol cig bdag la rol// 'dod pa gyis shig dga' gsal ba// khyod kyis gzhan du mi rtogs pa// rtogs pas the tshom ma byed cig/ a la la la ho// de nas
8a1(rgyud 'grel): rab tu chags ldan pas// de dang lhan cig lus kyi ni// spyod pas dben pa'i gnas su spyang // rol pas dga' ba brtag par bya// dang por 'dus ma byas nas su// de nas gru mo mtshan nyid dang // yang ni bskyang bar bya ba dang //
8a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin yar bteg mtshan nyid dang // shin tu bskyang bas lhu ru 'gyur// dpung pa rab tu bskyang byas nas// glu mo mdud pas mgul nas 'khyud// bcing bas dam 'khyud g.yas g.yon skra// mgo ni mi g.yo bzung nas blto// de nas brla gnyis
8a3(rgyud 'grel): par bltas te// bung ba lta bu sing sgra'i glu/ blangs nas mchu yis rtse bar bya// 'gying bag stabs kyis 'khyud nus ni// g.yon gyis spyi bo sla bzung ste// g.yas kyis lkog ma brten nas kyang // ma mchu sbrang rtsi bzhib par bya// bzhib cing sring sgra brjod nas
8a4(rgyud 'grel): kyang // nu ma lag rtse mgrin pa dang // ma mchu 'gram pa rna ba'i rtsa// mig drang spyi bo gsang bar yang // kha yis 'o bya brtse bar yang // rna ba gnyis dang mchan khung dang // mgrin pa gnyis dang sum mdo rnams// sen mo ri mos gdag par bya// nu ma gnyis/
8a5(rgyud 'grel): gtso gnyis dang ni 'gram pa gnyis// lag mthil gnyis dang rkang mthil gnyis// mnyes pas mdza' ba chen po 'grub// g.yon gyis pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// mnye zhing lce yis bskyod par bya// steng 'og tu'ang blta byas nas// sems kyis de la cha
8a6(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nas dga' ba'i bu mo des// pad+ma bstan nas 'di skad smra// rang 'byung bde chen rgyal po ni// pad+ma 'di na rab tu gnas// rtsa dang rlung gis rtogs 'gyur bas// khyod kyis rtsa yi 'khor lo tshol// de nas de yi sor mo yis// nang nas rtsa yi 'khor
8b1(rgyud 'grel): lo tshe// pad+ma la gnas snying po lngas// brgyan byas ze 'bra ge sar dang // 'dab ma brgyad pa gsal byas nas// A li kA li man+ta dang // kun ma ka dang shang sha ka/ nA li gsum po btsal bar bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug rtsa// gzung 'dzin bral ba b+ha ga'i dbu//
8b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i man ngag stobs kyis ni// sor mos go bar bya dgos so// de nas bcu dang ldan pa yi// lha mo de la 'khyud par bya// rdo rje pad+mar reg pa ni// bsnyen pa'i de nyid yin par bshad// rdo rje pad+mar zhugs pa ni// nye bar sgrub pa'i de nyid do// de nas bsgral zhing
8b3(rgyud 'grel): bskyod tsam gyis// snying ni 'dar zhing dran pa nyams// spyi bor skra 'grol gos kyang 'dor bar byed// rdul gyis lus khyab mdog dmar te// mig dmar phra bas bdag la blta// yang du bskul bas sgrub pa'o// de bas sems khral med pa ru ka sdom brtson
8b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhu dbyibs g.yo ba yis// sum mdo ye shes me sbar nas// khams bzhus nas ni bcu drug char// gyur pa me tog kun da 'dra// rlung gi sbyor bas phul bar bya// rang bzhin gyis ni rab zhi ba// chos kun zhi ba de kho na// bde ba de nyid nor lung 'dug/
8b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig dran med g.yo bar byed// sgrub pa chen po nyid do// na mkha'i khams dang rdo rje sbyor ba las ni yang dag spyan can bde chen 'byung bar 'gyur// gang gang yang dag dga' byed chags bral dga' gnyis bar du bden gnyis mthong byas brten par
8b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis// pad+ma mkha' la rdo rje nor bu pad snying gnyis la 'byor dang rdo rje skyil krung sems// nor bu bar du mthong byas gang de bde ba 'byung ba nges par de nyid ye shes te// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin par bla ma mchog rnams kun gyis yang dag bshad
9a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags chags bral bar ma mya dmigs ye shes lha ni skad cig de ru gsal// chu tshod brgyad dam nyin gcig zla ba gcig tu'am// lo gcig bskal pa 'am bskal pa stong du ye shes de myong bya// pad+ma la gnas bdud rtsi khu ba blo gros
9a2(rgyud 'grel): can gyis khA yis blangs nas btung bya'o// de 'dra'i dngos po thams cad kyi// mtha' yi de nyid zab gsal ba// thog med dus nas so so yi// skye bo nga dang ngar 'dzin pas// ma brtags par ni bdag tu bzung // dus las byung dang 'dod rgyal dang // gnam gyis
9a3(rgyud 'grel): bsgos dang gyi na dang // 'dzin pa pos ni sprul pa dang // khams kun las ni nges 'byung dang // dbang phyug dang ni byon pa'o// dus dang gtso bo byed pa dang // byed pa po ni ma yin dang // rnal 'byor dang ni tshad ma dang // dag pa dang ni ma dag pa// nang gnas brjod du med
9a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bdag/ skyes bu dang ni khyab bdag dang // srog dang gang zag rnams shes dang // kun gzhi dang ni shes pa'o// mthong ba po dang gzung 'dzin dang // shes pa dang ni shes bya dang // shes las skyes dang shed bu dang // srog dang gso ba la sogs pa// mu stegs
9a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis rnam par rtogs// nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis// shin tu 'dus ma byas pa ste// shin tu brtan byas 'dus byas kun// skad cig ma ste bdag po med// phra rab rdul las grub pa ni// blo yi rnam pa med pa ru// kha che bye brag smra bas rtogs// rang gi
9a6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa skyed byed pa// blta bya spyod yul rnam par ni// 'dus ma byas pa gsum po dag/ mo gsham bu bzhin med pa dang // 'du byed thams cad bems bsdigs dang // dus gsum rgyu ba ma yin dang // dman med thogs med gzugs ni// mdo sde pa yis rab
9b1(rgyud 'grel): tu rtogs// yan lag can yang don dam min// rdul phran dag kyang de bzhin no// so sor snang ba mi dmigs pa// rmi lam lta bur mi snang ste// gzung 'dzin spangs pa'i ye shes te// don dam shel ltar dag pa ru// rnal 'byor spyod pas rab tu rtogs// so sor
9b2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i gzhung thams cad // don dam min te gcig pa dang // du ma'i rang bzhin bral ba'i phyir// na mkha'i chu skyes bzhin du ni// gnyis med gnyis su med min zhi// shin tu dri med na mkha' ltar// blo ldan dbu ma pa yis rtogs// de la sogs te mtha'
9b3(rgyud 'grel): yis pa// don de kho na la gnas nas// tha dad so sor rtog pa'o// de bas de dag thams cad kyang // yang dag min pas bla dang bcas// 'og ma 'og ma'i rnal 'byor blo// gong ma gong ma khyad par 'phags// 'og ma'i blo ni gong ma yi// shes rab kyis ni sun
9b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byin no// de bas gong ma'i rim pa yis// lhan cig pa yi slob dpon gyis// byin gyis brlabs pa yang dag bya// gsal zhing rab dga' na mkha' 'dra// rang 'byung lhag pa'i lha chen po// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes kyis// bla ma'i kha las rtogs
9b5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de ltar dam tshig sdom ldan pa'i// snod du rtse gcig chu 'dra las// ye shes gzugs brnyan lta bu ru// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag/ de thob phyin chad rnal 'byor pas// 'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe// de yi nyes pas me gos so// ji ltar
9b6(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang sman ldan pas// sbrul dag gsod par byed pa bzhin// de 'dra'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// ye shes sman gyis rgyas btab pas// nyon mongs kyis ni ci byar yod// gang zhig lag na gdugs thogs la// de la char pas ci byar yod// de bzhin
10a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ye shes kyi// gdugs thogs la ni rtog pa yi// char pa rab tu 'bab 'gyur yang // de la de yis ji ltar gnod// de 'dra rab mchog ye shes ni// so so skye bos ga la shes// nyan thos rnams kyis mi shes so// rang sangs
10a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyis kyang mi shes// rnal 'byor spyong dang dbu ma pa// byang chub sems dpas mi shes so// bla bcas sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang // 'di ni cung zad mi shes so// 'di yi don shes ma 'ongs pa'i// rdo rje 'dzin pa mnyes byas nas// rang gi bsod nams
10a3(rgyud 'grel): chen stobs kyis// yi ge med par rnam par 'pho// de la dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma bzlas pa bgrang phreng dang // skyil mo krung dang stang stabs sogs// spros bral rnam par bslu ba ste// bya ba ma yin dgag pa min// lhag pa'i lha yis
10a4(rgyud 'grel): sbrusprul phyir ro// bya ba rnams la rnal 'byor pa// lam chen ngag tu yongs 'dzin pa// ri dgas smig rgyu sgeg pa ltar// rtag tu snang yang ma zin no// bya ba'i nang chen gyis zin la// ye shes g.yo med sman chen gyis// gso byed skyes bu dam pa'o// de
10a5(rgyud 'grel): bas lus ngag yid gsum gyi// sdom pa mchog la gnas byas nas// nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed la// rim pa gnyis pa de nyid bsgrub// dgon pa'am yang na grong gi mthar// gang rung cing rung de lta bur// bya bar 'os pa'i las kun yang // byas nas
10a6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba'i stan la 'dug/ de nas sems can thams cad kun// tshangs spyod chen po bzhis dmigs te// de la sogs pa rang rgyud kyi// las kyi sgrib pa dag byas nas// sems tsam la ni blta byas te// phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya// sems tsam de yadz+dza/
10b1(rgyud 'grel): stong byas nas// rang rig tsam du gnas par bya// rang rig de yang zla ba sogs// gdan du brtags nas yi ge'o// smyug gus bsnun byas mtshan mar gyur// dwe las rang nyid lhar bskyed la// lha yi nga rgyal dang ldan par// phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab ste//
10b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor 'khor lo sprul par bya// de mnyes de la goms bslabs pas// phyi rol lus ni log byed de// sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyod yul mchog/ mtha' yi de nyid bsgom par bya// rang snying dam tshig phyag rgya yis// thugs kar mtshan ma la gnas
10b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes mchog/ rig pa dang po ba rnams la// yi ge gzugs su rab snang ba// gzhom du med pa rang lha yi// sa bon 'od zer lha 'bar bas// de yis kha dog rnam lnga yis// 'od zer steng gi sgo yi ni// g.yas nas
10b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par spro bar bya// de yi rtsa la dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo ldan pa'i bde gshegs rnams// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang byas nas// dbugs kyi kun rtog las byung ba'i// sems can thams cad sangs rgyas sku// bskyed nas zla bar zhu bya
10b5(rgyud 'grel): ste// thim nas rnam par dag byas nas// de rnams ye shes ngo bo ru// g.yon pa'i ha sngar zhugs par bya// de yi mtshan ma dbus gnas pa// sa bon la ni gzhug byas par// de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yon tan kun bskyed rin po che// dngos
10b6(rgyud 'grel): kun la khyab pa'i bdag/ mi shigs pa yi thig le che// 'od zer lnga dang rab ldan pa'i// tsa na ka yi 'bru tsam du// rang gi sems su chos thams cad// bsdus nas rnam par bsam par bya// de yi 'od zer rim pa yis// rang gi gnas ni khyab par bya//
11a1(rgyud 'grel): de las phyir byung dam tshig rgya// nang gsal de yis phyi yi lus// gsal byas dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// de yi gnas kyang gsal bar bya// de las phyir byung bdag nyid nang // byang chub sems gzugs bcu drug po// mthe bo'i rtsa bar
11a2(rgyud 'grel): yi ge a// rje ngar gnyis la de bzhin A// brla gnyis la ni i yi gzugs// gsang ba la ni I yi gzugs// lte ba'i rtswa ru u gzugs gnas// de bzhin gsus par U yi gzugs// nu ma gnyis su ri gzugs gnas// de bzhin lag par r-I/
11a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs te// mgrin pa la ni l-i yi gzugs// de bzhin ma mchur yi ge l-I// 'gram pa gnyis su a gzugs so// de yi mig gnyis yang ni aM// rna ba'i rtsa bar oM yi gzugs// spyi bor oM gzugs yang ngag gnas// aM AHyi gzugs tshogs//
11a4(rgyud 'grel): kun la/ bcu drug dus su rdzogs 'gyur ba// gong ma'i 'od kyis rnam bkug ste// thig le ru ni gzhug par bya// de ru sems ni cung zad tsam// gzung bas lha yi 'khor lo che// rten dang bcas pa mos pas bsgom// de dbus bdag po thugs ka ru//
11a5(rgyud 'grel): gong ma'i ri mAM pas mi shigs pa'i// thig le chen po bsgom byas nas// yungs kar tshad tsam de las spro// rang gi gnas dang phyag rgya yi// nang gsal dkyil 'khor gsal byas na// de yi gnas dang bdag po yi// nang gsal phyi lus gsal
11a6(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// dkyil 'khor rten bcas gsal bar bya// de nas bcu drug gnas pa yi// 'od zer bzhag pa phyung byas te// phyi yi lus ni gsal bar bya// de yis dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // rten dang bcas pa gsal byas nas// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhu
11b1(rgyud 'grel): po yau/ bde gshegs kun gyi spyan sngar gshegs// bdud rtsi zhu nas zhal zhugs te// thig ler bdud rtsi blangs byas nas// rdo rje lam du byung nas su// 'o ma'i rgyun ltar sngon byas nas// thabs kyi ye shes galas zhugs te// de bzhin gzhan ni g.yon du
11b2(rgyud 'grel): zhugs// de nas ye shes thig li la// snang ba'i thogs pas thim par 'gyur// de ni 'dzug pa'i ngang tshul can// 'od zer lde 'bar dkar 'tsher ba// cung zad dmar ba'i nang du sems// mi grayo zhing ni gzung bar bya// de la gong ma'i
11b3(rgyud 'grel): rim pa ltar// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // gzung ba yang dag byas 'gyur bas// 'grog pa'i rdo rje sems nyid du// nam zhig de la reg 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog 'dzin pa// yid byin dpal dang 'dra ba yi// rtags rnams
11b4(rgyud 'grel): yang dag skye bar 'gyur// phung po khams dang skye mched kyi// lha rnams ye shes me yis su// thog mar snying gar sdud byed pa// cho ga 'di ni dang por bshad// de la sgrub pas byin brlabs pas// sna y-i rtse mor 'gro bas na// mi shigs thig le'i
11b5(rgyud 'grel): rjes thogs la// gsang ba'i thig le bsgom par bshad// gong ma'i ye shes thig le las// 'od zer lcags kyu 'dra ba rnams// phyogs bcur spros pas bde gshegs rnams// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang bcas kun// bkug nas ye shes//
11b6(rgyud 'grel): ngo bo ru/ rang gi snying gar rab tu btsud// de rnams zhu nas thig le la// zhugs pas rdul dang mun pa dang // snying stobs tshul du thig le yang // snying gi pad+ma la babs nas// rang gi rdo rje nor bu yi// dkyil du rnam par gnas pa las// 'byung ba lnga//
12a1(rgyud 'grel): yi gzugs can mchog/ ye shes lnga mjo ba nyid// 'ong zer lnga 'bar rang lha yi// mtshan ma phra mo rnams bsams nas// de yi thum brtan gyi rdung// yungs ka tsam dbus 'khor la chu// thig lar bcas pa mos bAr+ya/
12a2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom// gal te de la rang gi sems// bying bar song ngam skyo ba na// rdo rje las ni phyir byung ste// sna rtser rnam par gnas byas nas// dga' bral dga' bas brtag par bya// 'di yi thig le rnal 'byor las// gong gi rim pas 'od zer lha// steng gi sgo
12a3(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung ba dang // slar yang bdud rtsi 'gugs pa dang // de bzhin gzhi la gzhug pa dang // dbugs dgag stong pa'i yan lag go// de nas gsang ba'i thig le che// rab tu phra ba gong ma bzhin// rang sems ral bu dal bus gzung // dngos po med
12a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnas su 'gyur// de yang gzung ba goms pa yis// phyin log sa ni rnam par log/ smig rgyu lta bu snang ba ni// rtags ni dang por shes par bya// de bzhin du ni chu log pas// du ba lta bur 'byung ba ni// gnyis pa yin par shes par
12a5(rgyud 'grel): bya// me ni rnam par log gyur pa// mkha' snang 'dra ba gsum pa'o// rlung ni de bzhin ldog pas ni// mar me lta bu rab snang ba// rtags ni bzhi par shes par bya// de bzhin phyin log rnam par shes// log pas zab gsal gnyis med kyi//
12a6(rgyud 'grel): don dran sprin med na mkha' ltar// gsal ba rtags ni lta pa'o// mtshan ma lnga po de yi ni// mi gnas mya ngan 'das thob pas// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di la 'bad// gzung ba yi ni yan lag go// de ltar de la mtshan ma lnga// mthong byas don
12b1(rgyud 'grel): sa sgrub par bye// rdo y-i ni lam nas smra// nag pa / khams ts+tsha bar bya/ sgom tha dums mngon mthong ba'o// sa seM snang ba bskyed bar bya// sa sa m+b+ha sa su dran pa dang // rtswas nA yang dag rgyus dran dang // rdo rje rjes su dran pa dang/ rigs nA
12b2(rgyud 'grel): dngag rjes dran dang // khro bo rjes su dran pa ni// snang mdzad dang ni tshe dpag med// mi skyod rin chen 'byung ldan sogs// gshin rje gshing sogs khro bo'o// dkyil 'khor sku sogs ji snyed po// spro bsdu las ni gsal bar bya// de bzhin dam tshig
12b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes dran ni// rjes su chags dang cho ga bzhi// dang po spro bsdu las gsal bya// dkyil 'khor rjesu dran pa ni// cho ga gnyis pa la sogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor spro bsdu la gsal bya// sku ni rjes su dran pa dang // gsung dang thugs ni rjes dran dang // sems//
12b4(rgyud 'grel): can rjesu dran pa ni// sku dang gsung thugs bsgoms pa yi// rdo rje gsum ni spro bsdu las// rnam par smin cing dran pa'o// de bzhin sngags ni thams cad kyi// spyi gzugs rjes su dran pa ni// ye shes lha yis ye shes sems// bskyed pa dang /
12b5(rgyud 'grel): ni rang gi lha// longs spyod bzhi ldan spro bsdu las// rjes su gsal dang rnyed pa'o// dam tshig rjes su dran pa ni// bdud rtsi myang ba la sogs pa// spro bsdu las ni gsal byed pa'o// shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang // mA skyes rjes su dran pa ni//
12b6(rgyud 'grel): spros pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // ci yang yod pa ma yin te// de ni gnyis med ngo bo ru// spro bsdu las ni dran pa'o// zhe sdang rigs la sogs pa yi// mchod pa rjes dran sbyor ba ni// rang gi rigs la sogs pa yi// mchod pa rjes dran sbyor
13a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rlung gi rigs kyi bu mo mchog/ bar ma'i longs stong bani dag pa// rdus chags pas mnyes bya ba// sgo bsdu las ni gsal byed pa'o// rjes su dran pa'i yan lag go// de ltar yanA lag gsum gyis ni// gsang ba'i thig la ba
13a2(rgyud 'grel): byas nas// nor bu las ni byung nas kyang // khams gsum khyab par byed pas ni// sprul pa'i thig le bsgom pa bshad// rang gi spyi bo dbus su ni// sku yi rdo rje thugs ka ru// mtshan ma la gnas rlung dkyil 'khor// dud ka 'dra bar zla ba la// oM dkar
13a3(rgyud 'grel): 'ong ba'i mtshan nyid bsam// de bzhin mgrin pa'i dbus su yang // gsung gi rdo rje thugs kA yi// mtshan ma'i dbus su chu dkyil 'khor// dkar po dbus su zla tha lA// A dmar gnas pa'i rang bzhin bsgom// thugs kar thugs kyi rdo rje yi// thugs
13a4(rgyud 'grel): kAr mtshan ma la gnas pa'i// me yi dkyil 'khor dmar po la// zla gnas dbus su hUM nag po// 'gro ba'i rang bzhon bsams nas kyang // nu ma gnyis kyi bar du yang // dam cheg phyag rgya'i thugs ka ru// mtsha nA ma lA gnas dbang tshon
13a5(rgyud 'grel): mi/ dkyil 'khor ser po zla ba la// rang gi lha yi sa bon che// 'byung dang 'jug dang gnas byA la// rnam par grol ba'i sa bon bsams// de ltar phyag rgya bzhi chen dang // bdag nyid 'brel par byas nas su// rim pa 'dri yis mi shigs pa'i// rdo
13a6(rgyud 'grel): bzlas pa'i ngo bo bya// g.yas pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po ste// dog dud ka sgru ba las// 'byung ba hUM gi ngo bo yis// snang sring chos kun khyab byas nas// chos kun dag byas bdud rtsi 'gyur// oM gyi ngo bos 'os
13b1(rgyud 'grel): byA n+ya/ ra d+hAd+hA k+Sha bag n+tags ni// bzlas nas dug byas de la zhugs// ma ma dzo thos brgyus d+has nas// de wA l+yA yi de bzhin nyid// gzung bas dal dus ngal bus b+h+yas// dngos pa med pa'i gnas su 'gyur// g.yon pa nas ni 'byung ba'i khams//
13b2(rgyud 'grel): tshu yi kyil 'khor chen po ste// khwa dog dkar po rab byan pa pa// de las byung ba'i hUM dang ni// oM gyi rang bzhin 'dra ba dang // U yi rang bzhin gnas pa dang // de nyid gzung ba snga ma bzhin// gnyi ga l-Is nI drug tu 'byung // maM yi dkyil 'khor
13b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid yin te// kha dog dmar po ngo bo la s+ye// hUM gis spros dang oM gyis bsdus// AM yis gnas pa de nyid gzung // snga ma bzhin du shes par bya// de bzhin gnyis las dal bu 'byung // dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor rgyu// kha dog gsir ltar rab
13b4(rgyud 'grel): snang ba// de la hUM gis 'byung ba dang // oM gyis sdung nga a yi gnas// de la de nyid rab bzung bas// 'jug dang gnas deng ltung ba las// grol ba'i ye shes rnyed 'gyur ba// som nyi yid gnyis ma byed cig/ byug rgyu bzhi 'brel bzlas b+hA ni/
13b5(rgyud 'grel): bArgya nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// de ni dgu brgya rnam pa bskyes// zhag gcig tu ni nyi shu bA zhis// khyu phrag gnyis dang gcig stong dang // bcu phrag drug tu dus thams cad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rten yis// nyin mtshon bzlas brjod grangs byed do// 'di
13b6(rgyud 'grel): yis rnam pa'i chos thams cad// sgyu ma dang ni smig rgyu dang // khrag ca mgal mo'i 'khor lo dang // 'khrul pa dri za'i grong khyer dang // chu bur dang ni mig 'phrul dang // gzugs brnyan nu zla la sogs par// thams cad shes shing sa bcu pa'i// dbang
14a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug rnams dang bskal mnyam ste// rang bzhin bzlas pa 'di la ni// rnal 'byor pas ni rab tu 'bad// 'di ni thog ma med dus nas// rang bzhin yang dag rtag zla yang // bla ma yang dag ma brten par// don 'od rtogs par mi 'gyun
14a2(rgyud 'grel): ro// de ni yang dgra shes nas ni// bsgom pa'i bar chad phyi rol gyi// bzlas pa yongasu spang bar bya// bzlas pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog/ rdo rje 'chang ba brjod med sku// bsam brjod yul las rab 'das pas// ngag gis ji ltar bzlas pa byed
14a3(rgyud 'grel): de bas glang chen rnyed gyur pa// rjes kyis de la ci zhig bya// don de la gnas rnal byor che// phyi rol yang ni rten mi 'gal// glang po che yi stobs kyis ni// bud shing 'byung ba lta bu'o// de bas rdo rje bzlas pa mchog/ 'bad pas bde gshegs/
14a4(rgyud 'grel): thams cad kyis// byin rlabs nyid ni 'ong bas na// phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa yi// mtshan ma yang dang yang 'byung 'gyur// de byung cho ga la nas bAs// skad cig gis nA kun mkhyen tshe// rgyud las rab tu 'pho bar ni// the tshom med par nges
14a5(rgyud 'grel): pas na// cho ga 'di la rab tu 'bad// de ltar dga' gsum bye brag gi/ thig le rnam gsum bsgom pa yi// cho ga yang dag bstan pa'o// da ni gnyis med ye shes nyid// kun rdzob gzugs la brten nas kyang // mI g.yo la sogs
14a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yo dang bcas// tshangs sogs lce dang lce min sogs// thams cad rab tu mi snang yang // thig le 'gog par mi 'gyur te// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas pa kun// slar yang de las 'byung bar byed// de las skye bo rnams kyis ni// yang dag ma
14b1(rgyud 'grel): rtogs pa yi phyir// tshangs pa'i sgo nga lus skyes par// 'khrul pas chos rnams kyis mi bskul// gang gis kyang ni mi shigs pa// ji srid 'di ni lus gnas pas// las dang las min pa rab byed pa// brtan po 'jigs pa rab spangs pa'o// mngon gas zan
14b2(rgyud 'grel): le bsgom par bshad// tshangs pa'i spyod pa bzhi pa dang // phyi rol stong byas la sogs pa// rang gi lha ru bskyed nas kyang // phyag rgya bzhis ni rgyas btab pa// snga ma bzhin du shes byas nas// rim pa 'di yis thig le la// rang gi sems ni yang dag
14b3(rgyud 'grel): gzung // rung gi ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ma'i dbus gnas sa bon las// 'od zer lnga 'phros de yi rtse// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dpag med sprul// de yis khams kun khyab byas nas// dbugs kyi rta zhon kun rtog rnams// rnam par
14b4(rgyud 'grel): gsal te de dag kyang // dkyil 'khor 'khor lor rab byas te// gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdu byas nas// ye shes ngo bo sna bug g.yon// zhugs byas mtshan ma'i dbus gnas bya// sa bon la ni thim pas kyang // de ni phyogs dus gnas pa yi//
14b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas yon tan ci gsungs pa// yang dag bskyed byed mi shigs pa'i// thig le 'od zer lnga 'bar ba// rnam par gsal byas de lngas kyang // 'od zer 'byung bas rang gnas kyang // ye shes sems dpa'i nang gsal te// de yi phyi dang
14b6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor dang // gnas ni gsal bya de las byung // mthe bo'i rtsa dang rje ngar dang // brla gnyis dang ni gsang ba'i gnas// lto ba dang ni gsus pa dang // nu ma gnyis dang lag rtse dang // mgrin pa dang ni mchu gnyis dang // 'gram pa gnyis
15a1(rgyud 'grel): dong migo gnyis dang // rna ba'i rtse dang spyi bo dang // tshogs kun thig le a sogs kyi// gzugs gnas pa sgrub byas nas// mi shigs thig ler thim par bya// der ni rang gi sems cung zad// bzung bas rten dang brten can gyi//
15a2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lor mos byas de dbus su// mi shigs thig le ye shes la// snang ba'i ngo bo bsgom par bya// de yi 'od kyis rang gnas sogs// gsal byas ye shes thig le yi// nang gsal bzhag pa'i 'od zer gyis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten
15a3(rgyud 'grel): khams bzhugs pa'i// spyan sngar bdud rtsi zhu byas nas// zhal du zhugs nas snying ga yi// mi shigs thig ler rab song ste// klu gzugs bdud rtsir rab blangs nas// rdo rje lam nas phyung nas su// 'o ma'i rgyun ltar phyogs bcu nas// 'od
15a4(rgyud 'grel): pa yis ni sems can dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang mi rgyur bcas// yang dag bsdus nas gur sogs zhugs// de bzhin chos dbyings phyag rgya dang // rten gyi 'khor lor zhugs byas nas// de dag yang ni rab bsdus te// dkyil 'khor du ni rab
15a5(rgyud 'grel): bsdus nas// de yang bdag la bsta byas te// bdag nyid kyang ni mi snang brla// ye shes sems dpa'i gnas la dmigs// de yang 'khor lo 'khor lo yang // ye shes sems dbar gzhug par bya// ye shes sems dpa' mi snang nas// mtsha/
15a6(rgyud 'grel): ma'aba' zhig la dmigs bya// mo tshon ma de yang bsdu byas nas// mi shigs thig ler sems bzung ste// de las yang ni nang gi chags// kun bsdus rang sna cig le che// 'ba' zhig la sems yang dag gzung // ci ltar nus bzhin bsgom pas
15b1(rgyud 'grel): der sems ni yang dang yang du zhugs// yang ni de las phyir 'byung ste// de yi gnas dang rang gi lus// dmigs nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // rten dang khams gsum snang bar bya// de nas yang ni gong ma ltar// rim pas bcug nas thim byas
15b2(rgyud 'grel): la// sems ni thig ler bzhag par bya// rang gi dbang po der bzung nas// sa yi dkyil 'khor chu la zhugs// chu de me la de bzhin zhugs// me yang rlung la rab tu zhugs// rlung yang sems la zhugs par gyur// sems ni gnyis med ye shesu//
15b3(rgyud 'grel): cung zad zhugs pas brtags gnas pa// smig rgyu 'dra dang du pa dang // mar me mkha' snang rab 'dra ba// sprin med na mkha' ltar snang ba'i// mtshan ma lnga po 'byung bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' zhugs phyir ro// thig le la ni sems bzung
15b4(rgyud 'grel): ste// glal zhing rgod dang 'dar la sogs// rnal 'byor de la gang tshe 'byung // thig le yang dag spro byas nas// gong ma'i rim pas kun khyab bya// 'di ni yang dag goms byas pas// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa che// thabs kun gyi ni bsgrub bya mchog
15b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'chang ba chen po thob// 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa yi// ye shes 'ba' zhig dbang byas nas// rim pa gnyis pa bsgom pa'i thabs// mi shigs thig le bsgom pa'o// de ltar chos kun de bzhin nyid// dpag med dam pa'i phun sum tshogs// de
15b6(rgyud 'grel): dmigs yang dag skyes 'gyur ba// bsgom pa'i cho ga rnams bshad nas// rnam grangs dag kyang yongasu bstan// de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha'// bsam gyis mi khyab pa yi dbyings// chos nyid dang ni chos skyon med// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med/
16a1(rgyud 'grel): smon pa med pa nyid dang yang // nyon mongs khur chen 'byor byed pa// skye ba med dang 'od gsal ba// mngon par byang ni chub pa dang // gzhan gyi sems shes byed pa dang // lha yi rna ba ster ba dang // de bzhin lha yi mig ster dang //
16a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzu 'phrul dpag med sbrul chen dang // dngos po mthar ni phyin pa dang // don dam pa yi bden pa dang // rdzogs pa yi ni rim pa dang // yongasu dag pa'i sku gtsang dang // kun gyi bsten bya nyid dag dang // mkha' ltar rnam par dag pa dang // glo bur
16a3(rgyud 'grel): dri mas mi gos dang // gdong nas 'od gsal ba nyid dang // gang gis kyang ni mi shigs dang // dngos po med pa nyid dang ni// rgyu sogs bcu gnyis 'byung byed dang // dpal chen ye shes yongs dag dang // thig le chen po yongs drag dang // sangs
16a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi gsang chen dang // nam mkha' na mkha'i spyod yul dang // bsgom pa med pa nyid dang ni rje btsun man ngag chen po dang // rna nas rna bar 'pho byed dang // nyan thos kyis ni shes min dang // rang sangs rgyas sogs mi shes dang // yi ge med pa nyid
16a5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni// tshig dang bral dang brjod med sogs// de la mdo dang rgyud rnams las// de 'dra rnam pa mtha' yas pa// gsungs shing yang drag gsung 'gyur ba// der ni de bzhin nyid 'di las// gzhan ni ci yang ma gsungaso// de bas dad pa sngon
16a6(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i// sems kyis chos kun de bzhin nyid// gsal zab gnyis med don chen po// rim pa gnyis pa'i de kho na// bla ma'i gsung ni yang dag gzung // de gzung gong ma'i rim pa yis// rtag tu goms byed skyes bu gang // de la brtan pa'i
16b1(rgyud 'grel): rtags skyes nas// sa nas sar ni 'phar ba ltar// blo yi rnam pa gong du 'phel// rig 'dzin la sogs sprul pa yis// gzhan ni don de la sbyor byed// de yis bstan 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// sgrub pa'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur// bdag nyid can des bsgrub pa'i mchod//
16b2(rgyud 'grel): ji skad gsungs pa brtsam par bya// lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo// mi moM mi 'am ci mo 'am// mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnams// rang gi nus pas btsam par bya// smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la sogs pas// zla drug sogs par rab tu 'bad// de yis
16b3(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun yig med pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun ngo bo// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad gnas// chos kun de bzhin nyid zab pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsgrub bya mchog/ gong ma'i rim pa rnal 'byor pa// 'bad pa che thang rab byas pas// de ltar de ru mtshan
16b4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi 'tshul du cung zad rab gnas pa'i// dga' dang dga' ba bar ma dang // dga' dang bral ba'i dus su yang // ji bzhin gnas pa'i dga' ba gsum// ji skad gsungs pa thob par 'gyur// de nas mtha' med 'khor ba'i bar// rtag pa dang ni mi
16b5(rgyud 'grel): gdung dang // bsil ba dung ni gcig pa dang // bde ba dang ni dri med dang // dga' ba dang ni yid dga' ba// 'di ni bde chen ro myang brgyad// bdag po rdo rje 'chang ba mchog/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bya ba byas pa byed pa byas// dbang phyug
16b6(rgyud 'grel): chen po khur chen por// tsher ma dkrugs pa thams cad mkhyen// skyes bu dpa' bo kyang shes pa// glang po chen po dul ba'o// 'khor ba'i mtha' yi pha rol son// don dam pa dang ni kun rdzob kyi// bden pa gnyis med rnal 'byor che// tha ba spangs pa 'am
17a1(rgyud 'grel): lam klon rdzogs// yon+ta tan Sha byung gnas kun tu bzang // thams cad 'dus pa'i do kho na// sro sog sau khams kuna'i gongs pa'o// grong ni ming po yang dag gnas// de ltar ngo sogs rab grags po// mngo ni rnam pa mtha' yas pa//
17a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis med ye shes mtshon pa ste// mdo dang rgyud rnams thams cad du// blo ldan rnams kyis rtogs par bya// sa bcu dang ni rab ldan pa'i// gong ma'i lha mo rdo rje 'dzin// dge ba bcu gsum la gnas pa// skad cig gis ni yang dag tu// sgrib bral
17a3(rgyud 'grel): de yis rtogs par byed// phreng ba hA ra nu phur sogs// mdog dang ku tsa la sogs pa// pad+ma brtags pa'i dga' shes pa// dang por rab tu shes par bya// sha rdzas gri tra gri na sogs// glu dbyangs bstod dang sing sgra yi// snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis
17a4(rgyud 'grel): dga' 'gyur bas// gnyis pa ru ni shes par bya// tsan dan la sogs sna tshogs dris// lus byugs lhan cig rtsen byed che// dga' ba yang dag thob byed pa// gsum pa ru mi shes par bya// mo mchu sbrang rtsis bzhibs byas pas// mgor gnas bya
17a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems 'ju bas// ro 'thung dga' bas bdag mnyes pas// bzhi par rab tu shes par bya// lus la byug cing sna tshogs kyi// spyod pas rdzun tshe reg bya yis// yang dag dga' bar byed pas na// lbu pa ru ni shes par bya// de yis ye shes
17a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa gsum// rig par byed cing rang gi yid// yang dag dga' bar rab byed pa// drug par shes bya rnal 'byor pas// de yi lus ni bdag gi ni// rten du gnas pa sra ba yi// yang dog dga' bar byed pas na// bdun pa ru ni shes par bya// de yi//
17b1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i zil sogs dang // byang sems rlan gyis rang gi sems// rab tu dga' bar byed pas na// brgyad par rab tu shos por bya// gsang gnas drod sogs tsho ba yos// ba~M gau gi yid ni yaung dgau pararau// dga' bar byed pa'i mchog yin pas// dgu pa ru ni shes
17b2(rgyud 'grel): par bya// de nas bskyod pas ye shes mes// phung po khams sogs sreg byed pas// yid ni yang dag dga' 'gyur bu// bcu par rab tu shes par bya// bcu po de yis dang po dang // phyis kyi 'bras bu mchog 'gyur ba// gong du gsungs pa rab thob ste// de bas de
17b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra'i don chen la// yang dag 'jug par mi nus pa'i// gdul bya rnams la bde gshegs kyis// rab tu dga' sogs mtshan nyid du// bstan nas de yi don zhugs pas// de yis rtogs kyang bla dang bcas// de nyid dang po rnal 'byor la// rten dang brten
17b4(rgyud 'grel): can dkyil 'khor gyi// 'khor lo rab tu bstan byas nas// de zhugs de la brtan byas pas// rtogs kyang don 'di ma shes na// yang dag sangs rgyas ma yin no// 'di ni rang 'byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba
17b5(rgyud 'grel): ni/ bcu gsum sa zhes bya bar bshad// de ltar rim pa gnyis pa yi// de bzhin nyid ni thabs bcas pa'i// bdud rtsi mchog 'di rnal 'byor gang // 'thung bar byed pa sangs rgyas kyi// de yi sras su nges pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi groH//
17b6(rgyud 'grel): rig pa 'dzin pa'i dpon po ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyo ru 'gyur// nyan thos rang 'dren rnams kyi ni// 'dren par byed pa'i gtso bo ste// sems can phal pa'i rje btsun no// de la phyogs bcu khams bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
18a1(rgyud 'grel): dang // rig pa'i lha dang khro bo sogs// me tog la sogs mchod par bcas// zhag gcig skya reng dang po dang // phyed ni dros pa'i dus nyid dang // chal tshil mtshamasu nam mkha' las// mchod pa byas nas sngags brjod cing //
18a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur// de bas dag pa'i lha rnams kyang // de bzhin du ni mchod byed na// ma dag pa yi lha rnams ni// de la ci yi phyir myi mchod// sems can phal pa gzhan gyis ni// me tog snyim pa bkang nas ni// mgrin pa dma'
18a3(rgyud 'grel): bas zhabs 'dud cing // rtag tu bskur bar shin tu 'os// de ni skyes bu rkang gnyis gtso// kun mkhyen rnams kyis bzhag pa ste// byin log khar chen por byed pas// ma 'ongs rdo rje 'chang ba ste// de la brnyas byed sems can gang // sgrub
18a4(rgyud 'grel): pa blo de glang dang 'dra// de yis nga la brnyas byed pas// ngas ni de kun dus kun spong // cig shos lus lnga nga gnas phyir// mchod cing brjod pas lus rnams kyi// sgrib pa de yis dag byed do// rimA pa gnyis 'dir sgrub pa po// rtse gtsin/
18a5(rgyud 'grel): pa yis rnam par gzung // de gzung tshe 'di nyid lnga yang // brtul zhugs cho ga nyid kyis ni// lha mos rkyen ni rab byas te// phyag rgya chen po rang rgyud la// 'pho bar the tshom mi bya'o// da ni rang nyid byin brlab pa'i// rim pa 'di ni rnal 'byor pa//
18a6(rgyud 'grel): bya bas bskal pa 'ga' zhig la// yang dag tu ni bshad par bya// gang zhig bla ma mnyes byas nas// des gnang dam sdom bcas pa ru// bum pa la sogs rab thob ste// bla ma'i zhal las rnyes pa yi// de bzhin nyid ni rab thob cing // gsang dang
18b1(rgyud 'grel): mchog tu gsang rig pas// ji skad bshad pa'i bya ba yis// yang dag bsgom ni mi nus pas// ji bzhin pa yi de kho na// rim pa 'di yis bsgom par bya// gang zhig dus ni phyi zhig la// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma bdag gis mthong // 'chi bar gyur pa'i dus byung na//
18b2(rgyud 'grel): nad kyis yang dag ma rnyogs par// 'pho ba'i sbyor ba yang dag bya// dpral ba dang ni lte ba dang // spyi gtsug dang ni mig dang ni// rna ba dang ni sna dag dang // chu ya gnas dang chu min gnas// kha yi gnas dang ye shes kyi// 'gro 'ong gi ni rtags waM
18b3(rgyud 'grel): bya 'bral ba gzugs kyi khams kyi ni// rtags skyes pa ru shes par bya// lte bar 'dod khams lha rnams kyi// rtags byung de ru skye bar nges// spyi gtsug gzugs med khams rnams kyi// rtags byung de ru skye bar 'gyur// sna gnyis ye shes
18b4(rgyud 'grel): 'pho ba na// gnod sbyin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// rtswa gnyis rig pa 'dzin pa yi// gnas su nges par 'gro ba'o// mig gnyis mi rnams rgyal por 'gyur// rtags ni yang dag skye bar 'gyur// khA ru ye shes 'pho ba na// yi dgas
18b5(rgyud 'grel): rtagasu shes par bya// chu gnas dud 'gro rnams kyi rtags// rtagasu yang dag rab shes bya// chu min bu gar ye shes 'gro// dmyal ba rtagasu shes par bya// da ltar ye shes 'pho bo yi// rno ba'i cha ni shes byas nas// sgrogs pa lnga yis
18b6(rgyud 'grel): yi ge yis// steng gi sgo bdun dgag par bya// chu yi sgo ru suM gis dgag/ chu min k+ShuM gis dgag par bya// de ltar sgo dgu bkag nas kyang // rim pa 'di yis rang sems kyis// gnas ni rab tu btsal byas pas// dbyings nyid du ni nges par
19a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gro phung po skye mched khams rnams su// rnal 'byor rgyud kyis dpyad pa ltar// rnam par bsgom byas ye shes so// gong na med pa rtogs par 'gyur// bdag nyid ji skad gsungs pa bzhin// lha yi lus su gyur byas la// chos
19a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings dang rnam shes dang // bdag nyid sangs rgyas bskur byas bu'o// gnas ni rin chen sna tshogs pa'i// kha dog sna lngas rab brgyan pa'i// rdo rje rtse mo dgu pa mchog/ bdag gi spyi bo'i steng du ni// bsams nas de ru rang gi sems// rdo rje dkar
19a3(rgyud 'grel): po bcu tshal tsam// rtse lnga bsams nas brtag par bya// yar gyi rtse lnga thabs lnga ste// de bzhin mar bltas shes rab lnga// dbus kyi bum pa rI bong can// bsams nas de ru ye shes che// ser po byang chub sems 'dra ba// 'dzag pa'i ngang
19a4(rgyud 'grel): tshul dang 'dra ba// thig le tsa na ka yi 'bru// lnga 'byor tshad du bsgom par bya// de nas chos kun thams cad kun// med par bsnams nas bdag dmigs te// bdag kyang bdag la thim byas nas// sems tsa ma de yang mda' bzhin du// spyi
19a5(rgyud 'grel): bor rdo rje 'og cha yi// bu gur zhugs nas thig lo thim// de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// lha mo rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi// gnas su shes par rab tu bya// de ni gdong nas grub pa'i gzugs// de ru shes pa rab zhugs pa// sems
19a6(rgyud 'grel): de yang dang yang du gzung // de las sems de yar ba ltar// rdo rje rtse dgu steng cha yi// bu gur byung nas sna tshogs kyi// pad+mar zla ba gnas pa la// rdo rje sems dpa'i skur gyur to// mtshan dang dpe byad kun brgyan pa// rgyan kun brgyan pa'i
19b1(rgyud 'grel): na bza' dang // bral nas shin tu gsal dmigs te// de gnyis med pa'i sbyor ba yis// byin brlabs las byung 'khor lo che// rnam par 'phro zhing 'du bar bsam// de ltar rnam par bsgom pa mchog/ yang dang yang du ci nus bsgom// bsam pa de yi
19b2(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyis ni// bdag sems dbyings su zhugs pa'i tshe// gsal zhing rab dga' mkha' 'dri rtogs// de nas rdzu yul shugs ldan pa'i// lo lnga lon pa'i byis pa'i gzugs// 'grub tshe dpe med bde rdzogs rtogs// de las skye gnas gzhan
19b3(rgyud 'grel): du ni// 'phen par byed tshe sprul pa'i gzugs// yang dag du ni rtogs par 'gyur// de lta bas na sems can gyi/ bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis// mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyong // de dang de ni mdo bzhin du// sna tshogs nor bu lta bur
19b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// chos sku rab dga' mkha' mnyam pa// shing dang brgya lnga dang gnyid log dang // glal dang 'khrig dus skad cig tsam// myong bar 'gyur bas rab bsgoms na// lus can rnams ni yid ni sbyong // cho ga 'di yi sems can gang // mtshams
19b5(rgyud 'grel): me de byed cing rmongs pa yi// skye bo bram ze gsod pa yang // de yis mi 'grub cung zad med// dri bas bka' lung rab thob nas// dam sdom rnam par bsrung byas te// sku gsum 'grub par the tshomo med// gal te sku gsum ma grub na// rig pa
19b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin pa'i gtsor 'gyur te// rim gyis phyag rgya chen por 'gyur// de ltar rnam pa gsum gyis ni// dngos grub de ni bsgom pa bshad// gang zhig 'di ni ma rtogs par// gsang ba smra bar byed pa ni// de la nga dang de bzhin gshegs// nam zhig/
20a1(rgyud 'grel): de la sbyar byas pas// byin gyis rlob par mi byed do// 'di ni don ldan 'ga' zhig la// nga ni de yi lus gnas te// bsgrub pa gzhan la mchod pa len// de yis de mnyes rang gi rgyud// las kyi sgrib pa dag byed do// 'di don rna bar 'o/
20a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// gang gi dus su gnas pa der// sangs rgyas bstan pa rin chen yang // gnas par rab tu bshad pa yin// brgyud pa'i rim pa 'di chad nas// sangs rgyas bstan pa nub par ru// kun gyis rab tu shes par bya// de bas khyod kyi yid gcig
20a3(rgyud 'grel): tu// yang dag bsdus la ma 'ongs pa'i// gang zag mngon du tshogs bskyed pa'i// skal ldan 'ga' la rnam par brgyud// sim byed 'di la sbyor du chug/ 'di sbyor 'di ni yang dag pa'i// rnal 'byor pa ru shes par bya// khyod kyang zos kyi spyod pa dang // /
20a4(rgyud 'grel): ngal cung zad 'khrul rtogs pas// khyod kyis tshe 'di nyid la ni// gzugs bcas phung po ring lus ni// gnas ni yang dag mi 'gyur te// rnam par shes pa mi shigs pa// phyag rgya chen por rab tu 'grub// de bas chod kyis yang dag blos// sangs
20a5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kun gyi 'dus pa'i rgyud// gsang chen gsang la ches gsang ba// gong na med pa'i lung chen po// 'di yi rim pa dang po yi// sgrub pa'i thabs dang sbyin sreg dang // gtor ma sna tshogs 'khor lo dang // bsdus pa dang ni rnams bshad dang //
20a6(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor cho ga la sogs pa// mi shes mun sgrib sems can gyi// thur ma lta bur brtsam par gyis// de bas ma 'ongs rnal 'byor ches// 'di shes bla ma rab mnyes te// yang dag 'dod pas blangs byas nas// sems ni de nas sbyang bar bya// /
20b1(rgyud 'grel): sems ni kun rtog rnams spangs nas// de sbyor de la rig pa skye// rig pa skyes nas rdo rje 'dzin// da grub pas na sangs rgyas dang // pha rol phyin dang gzungs rnams dang // sa rnams thams cad bde chen po// rjes las yang dag 'grub par
20b2(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// thams cad bde chen las byung phyir// de bsgoms ci phyir de mi 'byung // de bas rab tu 'bad pa yis// mchog gi de nyid rab gsang gsang // smon la gyis kyang the na 'grub// bsgrub pa la ni shin tu 'bod// a la la la ho// de ltar rol
20b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gar bcas sgra brnyan lta bu rdo rje'i glu/ 'khor lor bcas pas de nyid glu blangs bdag la bstod cing der// na mkha'i khamasu sprin rnams med pa lta bur thim par 'gyur// dge slong bla ma gnyis bcas de yang de bzhin mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje
20b4(rgyud 'grel): gdan gyi 'gab nas rgyang grags lnga bcu song ba'i sar// rAr pu ta yi phug la brten te sems can don bya'i phyir// 'di bsdus rab tu byed pa thams cad rtsom dang ston sogs byas// dam pas gsol ba rgya chen btab pas bdag ni shin tu brong //
20b5(rgyud 'grel): der gnas 'khor bcas rnams kyi yo byad gos zas nor gyi mdzod// mchod pa'i yo byad rgya chen sna tshogs 'khor lo bya ba rnams// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpar gyur pa mdzod gsungs gnod gnas che// nyin re kaR+Sha pa Na bdun brgyas rtag
20b6(rgyud 'grel): tu rab tu sbyor// de nas bla ma chen po b+ha la~M pa tI drung du bgrod// bdag gis bla ma de yang mnyes bya'i phyir na sgrub pa'i thabs// cung zad bsdus pas de ru bla ma la sogs kun// mnyes par byas te sngon gnas bgrod nas skal ldan don dga' byas//
21a1(rgyud 'grel): de bas de ltar kun gyis gtam rgyud rgyas par shes byas te// mkhas pa'i gzu bo dam pa thabs kun gyis ni mnyes bya ste// de yi lung la rab tu byed sogs mnyam dang bsdam par bya// de la rab brten dgon sogs rab tu brten/
21a2(rgyud 'grel): byas rang gi sems// de nyid bsgoms pas ji bzhin rab tu rtogs par byas pa yis// tshe 'di nyid la zla ba drug gis byang chub thob pa 'di ni su yis bzlog/ bdud rtsi mchog 'thung 'di ni sems can kun gyis bkur ba'i gnas// sems chen de la rdo rje 'chang
21a3(rgyud 'grel): dang bder gshegs kun gyis bsngags// de'i phyir log pa'i sgrib pa thams cad sa bon nyams byas ste// 'khor bar gnas kyang skyon gyis ma gos pade bzhin rtag tu gnas// de ru ma thob lan grangs gzhan la yang dag myong ba yi// 'bras bu smin byed
21a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa'i yid la yang dag 'byung ba yi// dngos grub rgya chen thob nas gang+gA'i bye snyed dpag med kyi// 'khor gyis bskor nas 'jig rten khams kun thams cad rab tu bgrod// de bas chu 'khor drag po khur lhung ltar// lus dang ngag dang sems kyi
21a5(rgyud 'grel): brtson 'grus bskyed// rim par sngon bzhin rab tu bsgrub par bya// dal 'byor lus 'di shin tu g.yo sla bas// ji ltar rlung gis mar me gsod pa ltar// skad cig tsam du mi sdod dus 'da' byed// de bas 'dir ni chung gsan mi bya ste// dngos kun de nyid
21a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen rab bsgom bya// de nyid spyod pa 'di la blo nges pas// ji skad bshad bzhin rab tu 'gyur bas na// sems ni yang dag bstan par gyis shig ces// bdag ni sems can rnams la gsol ba 'debs// gang gi phyir na 'di na gsang bas
21b1(rgyud 'grel): na khadag gis gsal bar ma byas ci yod pa// des na de shes bla ma yang dag par// mnyes byas de nyid 'dod pas yang dag long // 'di ni rnal 'byor spyod pas yang dag spyod pa la// snying po'i snying po 'bras gsol yang dag spyong // mtha' yi phar son bla tshun
21b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tan ma lus rten// de las 'di ni yang dag zhal rnyed byas// de bas rnal 'byor chen po rgyud kyi don rnams ni// mi 'tsham par ni snang yang nyi ma'i dpes// rang dang gzhan gyi don byed nus pas na// rnal 'byor 'gas ni shin tu 'bad dgos so// the tshom som nyi ma
21b3(rgyud 'grel): par dad pa yis// 'di don grus pas yang dag blangs byas nas// shes rab kyis ni ying dang yang du rung // spyad pas bdag la gnyis med ye shes che// chu gtsang nong du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar// 'byung 'gyur 'di la the tshom ma byed cig/ 'di ni
21b4(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin grub pa'i man ngag las// brgyud pa'i bla ma yang dag rab brten dang // rang gi bsod nams tshogs ni sngon bskyed pas// rtogs par rab tu 'gyur ba ma rtogs par// bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis bskal pa dpag med par// 'dri ni rtogs pa
21b5(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur 'di don ma rtogs na// rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya de la mi bya'o// de ltar rab tu shes par byas nas su// rdzogs pa chen po ye shes spyi yi gzugs// yongasu dag sku rdo rje 'chang chen po// dpal ldan kun gyi ngo bo rim gnyis 'dis// sdug
21b6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal lam bcas bskal pa gsum du yang // rang gi rjes mthun byang chub bla dang bcas// thob nas de bde cung tsam rab chags pa// rnal 'byor 'di yis ci phyir de mi bsgom// dad dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzim shes rab dang // dran pa'i blo yis gong
22a1(rgyud 'grel): gau rim pa ltar// yid dga'i gnas brtan kun tu bzang po mchog/ lam 'di bsgom par bya ba kho na'o// de ltar zhal gyi lung bsdus las byung dge bu tri med pa// kha ba zla ba'i 'od ltar rab tu dkar ba de y-i swA ni// 'di don
22a2(rgyud 'grel): ma 'ongs 'gro ba skal ldan 'ga' dang phrad gyur nas// rab tu dang po'i dad pas len cing 'di mchog rab bsgoms shog/ blugs dang gtor ma dang dag par byas pas slob dpon cher 'gyur te// thams cad kun gyi rgyud 'dzin gzhan
22a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams rgyud kun la sbyor ba'i// drang po'i rim pa rab rtogs dri ma rnams ni dag byas te// ye shes sgyu ma'i snod du rung bar rnal 'byor de 'gyur shog/ snying rje ldan pa'i bla ma'i zhabs la gus par rab ldan pas// ri bong 'dzin pa'i
22a4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs kyis rang rgyud rab tu smin byas te// zhing dag byas pas chos kun skye sogs don du rab rtogs nas// byams pa la sogs bzhin du sems can kun gyi 'gro bar shog/
22a5(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig byed pas byin brlangs rje btsun thugs rje chen po yis// dga' ba rnyed pas chos kun dag pa'i ngo bo chen po mchog/ ji bzhin gnas pa'i don la mi bslu bcu drug thig le cha// nga lnga gso las thob man ngag chen po
22a6(rgyud 'grel): rab tu rnyed par shog/ de rnyed de la sems ni yang dag rab tu mgu 'gyur bas// mgrin pa dma' bas brtags nas rang rig chos kyi sku ni yang dag thob// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang dpag med sprul pa'i gzugs kyis ni// khams gsum
22b1(rgyud 'grel): bkang nas sems can thams cad srid las sgrol bar shog// rig pa gnyis pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhal gyi lung / dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpan chen po lha sangs rgyas dpal b+ha ye
22b2(rgyud 'grel): shes zhabs kyis bsdus pa zhal nas gal du brgyud pa rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po ka ma la gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po lha ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
23a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyal ye shes kyis la sngams kyi sgrub thabs kyi man ngag zhal gyi lung 'jugs
23b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ mu kha A gA ma/ bod skad du/ zhal gyi lung / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// dbul ldan ral gri las byung gur gum mdog/ zhi ba'i zhal gsum phyag ni drug ldan zhing // shes rab kyis
23b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud chu skyes la zhugs pa'i// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal nas// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i rim pa'i gzhung lugs kyi// sgrub thabs bdag nyid dran phyir brtsam par bya// 'jam dbyangs bde bar rtogs pa'i don du ni// rtog
23b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i nga rgyal bde ba dang bral ba// sgra yi tshogs kyi sdeb sbyor bral dgongs pa// sbas rnams slob dpon zhabs kyis 'gro dron du// gsal bar sgra ji bzhin du bshad don to// sdeb sbyor yongs shing mtshon nyid dang bral zhing // gang yang don zab
23b4(rgyud 'grel): tshad mas shin tu sbas// blo dman rnams kyis de rtogs mi 'gyur ba'i// dpal ldan ye shes zhal bshad sgrub thabs kyi// man ngag shin tu gsal bas bshad par bya// 'bad po chen pos bla ma mnyes bya ste// shin tu sdug sogs khyad
23b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags sbyin pa dang // gzhan yang mchog tu gyur pas mchod byas na// 'dir ni 'dod pa'i bka' drin ster bar 'gyur// chu yi dbang dang cod pan ming dang ni// rdo rje dril bu zhes ni bshad pa dang // bum pa zhes bya mchog tu gsang ba dang // shos
23b6(rgyud 'grel): rab zhes bshad lung bstan brtul zhugs dang // dbugs dbyung de rnams cho ga ji lta bar// rjes snang thob cing bla ma 'jam dbyangs dang // sngags pas bsrung ba'i thabs dang dam tshig dang // rtag tu sdom pa la gnas mngon ldan pa// yang dag
24a1(rgyud 'grel): thob cing sa phyogs gtsang mnyam pa// yid du 'ong zhing chu yis chag chag btab// dri bzang nyi zla chu dang sman rnams kyis// rab byugs me tog chal par bkram pa dang // gla rtsi ku ku ma tsan dan gyis mdzes pa// yang na sems
24a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis 'dir ni rnam par bsam// bde ba'i stan la rdo rje skyil krung bcas// sems can la brtse ting 'dzin dang por bsgom// ji srid pa 'di sangs rgyas ma lus gyur// de srid bdag gis skyil krung gzhog mi bya// ma lus 'gro tshogs sangs rgyas rnam
24a3(rgyud 'grel): bya zhes// de ltar smon lam khyad 'phags gdab par bya// 'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu thams cad dang // rang lus stong pa nyid du bsgom bya ste// rang lus lha yi ngo bo nyid du 'od gsal ba// rang gi sems tsam las byung blta bar bya// gang yang 'di ltar yi ge
24a4(rgyud 'grel): oM dang por// swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA/ swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho haM gsang sngags rgyal// mtha' thug brjod cing 'dir yang de 'og tu// rang gi snying gar a las zla ba bsgom// de dkyil 'od zer tshogs ni ser po mo// khams gsum mun pa'i tshogs ni 'jom
24a5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa// rnam thar rnams gsum gyi sgo dag par 'gyur// oM shU n+ya tA zhes dang por rnam par thar// gzhan ni a mr-i ta ra zhes su bshad// oM a pra ti hi taM sgra de rnams// 'dir bdag ye shes la sogs zhal gsum 'dod// ngas ni lha mig dag pa
24a6(rgyud 'grel): thob gyur nas// de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong // sna tshogs gzhal yas khang byas dbugs gnas pa'i// bla ma mgon po na mkha' la gnas mchod// snying po'i sa bon gyis spros 'od zer tshogs// las byung gzugs sogs
24b1(rgyud 'grel): dgu bo'i bdag nyid dang // me tog la sogs phyi rol rang gi mgon// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyis mchod bsam// rdzogs sangs 'khor lo'i spyan sngar sA la ni// pus btsugs dman pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar byas// dkyil 'khor mgon po mchod
24b2(rgyud 'grel): pas rab mchod cing // sdig pa bshags pa la sogs brjod par bya// bdag gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang // chags dang zhe sdang rnam par rmongs pa yis// srid pa nyam nga rnamasu sdig bgyis pa// des na sdig de thams cad rab tu bshags// /
24b3(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa bshags pa'o// sngon chad byas pa'i sdig pa bshags nas kyang // slar yang de la 'jug par mi bgyid cing // byang chub snying po la gnas gyur gyi bar// rtag tu bdag gis bsod nams blo ldan shog/ sdom pa'o// rdzogs sangs rgyas mgon
24b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' mchog/ 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang bgyis pa// de la'ang bdag ni byang chub 'bras thob par// ma lus pa la bdag ni rjes yi rang // rje su yi rang ba'o// legs par gsungs chus bran pa'i bsod nams kyi// myug
24b5(rgyud 'grel): ni bdag gis rim thob 'phel ba yis// 'khor ba'i gdung bas bcom pa'i 'gro rnams la// yang dag byang chub shing bcos 'bras bcas 'gyur// yongasu bsngo ba'o// rdzogs sangs rin chen rang gi sems gnas dang // rtog pa'i dra ba rab tu rnam
24b6(rgyud 'grel): bral chos// sa dbang sogs dang brtul zhugs dbang dge 'dun// rab tu dad pas rtag tu skyabasu mchi// gsum la skyabs su mchi ba'o// sdug bsngal tshogs kyis bsregs pa'i sems can kun// snying rje ldan pas byung kun gtong ba ni// dam chos
25a1(rgyud 'grel): chu char rab bsregs 'joms pa yi// sangs rgyas sgrub ces rang sems bskyed par bya// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// sbyin pa la sogs bya bas skabs byas te// 'das pa'i rgyal ba'i sras rnams kun gyi lam// gshegs dang
25a2(rgyud 'grel): gshegs 'gyur 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dpal 'bras lam mchog de la brten par bgyi// lam la brten pa'o// rgyal dang bdag nyid la skyes de rnams la// kun nas kun tu bdag nyid bdag gis dbul// sems dpa' mchog gis bdag nyid
25a3(rgyud 'grel): yongs bzung bas// dang bas khyed la 'byangasu mchi bar gyi// bdag nyid dbul ba'o// glo bur nyon mongs tshogs tshan gyis gdungs pa// bskyod pa'i skye bo mtha' med dgrol ba'i phyir// chos kyi bdud rtsi sngags rnams bshad pa ru// sman mchog mgon po la
25a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag bskul lo// bskul ba'o// mchog tu mi dge bsam pas rab bcom pa'i// bdud kyi sgyu rgan dang 'chi ba las// mya dran 'das bzhed gyur pa spangs nas su// mugron mchog bzhugs par bdag ni gsol pa 'debs// gsol ba gdab pa'o//
25a5(rgyud 'grel): tshigs bcad rdzogs byas legs zhes brjod nas ni// thub dbang tshogs rnams de nas mi sdong gyur// hUM bsgoms nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// nam kha' a dza ni ri'i mdog ldan pa// de byung sna tshogs rdo rje'i nyid kyil gnas// de las gtso bo'i
25a6(rgyud 'grel): sa bon 'od ldan pa// de las sna tshogs rdo rje'i sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs rnams thams cad char gyis yongasu gang // de las phyogs brgyad rdo rje'i rang bzhin char// rab 'bab de yis dra bar sprul par dmigs// des ni sa bdun 'og la sogs 'phel
25b1(rgyud 'grel): nas// srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du mda' rnams so// steng gi sa bon gyur pas skad cig la// sna tshogs rdo rje yi ni bla re byung // 'od zer de tshogs mda' dang 'dra ba yis// nam mkha' khyab par kun tu gdug su gyur// yaM las byung ba'i rlung ni 'og tu bsam// gzhur
25b2(rgyud 'grel): byas 'od sngon rgyal mtshan gyis ni mtshan// b+he ram pa zhes bya ba dum bu min// 'gro ba'i snying po 'dzin 'gyur bzhag par bya// dbus su gru gsum 'bar ba rab dmar ba// raM gyi sa bon las byung phyogs gzhu 'dren// mthong nas de'i dbus su mtshams
25b3(rgyud 'grel): bcing bya/ baM dkar las byung ba yi bum+ba mtshan chu// de dbus laM las byung ba'i mdog ser po// ra ba'i don du gru bzhi dbang gi'o// hUM gis sna tshogs rdo rje byas sa phyogs// de dbus ra bar rnal 'byor pa yis bya// 'di ni zhing rnam par dag pa'o// bruM ser la
25b4(rgyud 'grel): byung 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa'i// rtse mo'i 'od zer phyogs bcur spro bar bya// rtsibs rnams thams cad kyi ni lte ba'i phyogs// baM byung pad+ma'i steng du ra skyes nyi// legs gsungs rgyal ba rnams kyi skyed byed yaM// bruM byung ye shes rnams ni gang yin
25b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid// sdug bsngal la sogs bcu gcig rnams kyi phyir// nyi ma nyi ma'i steng du hUM dgong bya// ye shes bcu gcig bcas 'dir 'khor lo la// nyi ma la gnas hUM byung rdo rje sngo// lte ba'i pad+ma nyid byung rdo rje las// dpal ldan rdo rje hUM mdzad sku ru gyur// /
25b6(rgyud 'grel): yan lag kun ni dbu ma'i zhal dang 'dra// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon pa'i zhal yang dmar// shin tu 'jigs pa'i phyag drug 'jigs pa'i spyan// 'jigs pa'i bskal pa'i sprin 'dra sgra sgrogs pa// rig ma kun tu bzang mos yang dag 'khyud// /
26a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis kyis ni yan lag yongasu sdems// g.yas gnyis rdo rje ral gri 'dzin pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu lag pa g.yon gnyis 'dzin// g.yas pas u ma'i nu ma'i dkyil mnan cing // g.yon pas bde
26a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byung dregs pa'i mgo bo gnon// de bzhin zhabs kyi g.yas brkyang bzlog pa yis// gnas pa'i mgon po sku ni rab tu sgeg/ rtsibs re re la nyi ma bcu gnas pa'i// hUM byung mtshan ma 'dzin pa spro bar bya// bsdus na tho ba dbyug pa pad+ma
26a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // rdo rje de rnams dbang sogs phyogs gnas bskyed// skor phyogasu ni lcags kyu dbyug pa mdung// rdo rje me la sogs pa'i mtsham su bskyed// 'khor lo dgra sta gnyis ni steng 'og tu// skyed par byed de khro ba'i zhal ljang dgod// gshin rje mthar byed
26a4(rgyud 'grel): na gyis mi thub dang // rta gdong bgeg kyi tshogs ni rnams par 'joms// Tak+ki dbyug sngon dang ni stobs po che// khro bo ma g.yo gtsug tor gnod mdzes rgyal// gnyis ni dkar po rtag gdong dmar po ste// de bzhin gtsug tor 'khor lo sgyur ser
26a5(rgyud 'grel): po/ bdun po gzhan dag kyang ni shin tu sngo// kun kyang nyi ma'i dkyil gnas rab tu grag/ g.yas pa'i pus mo'i tshigs ni shin tu bskums// g.yon pa'i brla dang rje ngar gnyis rab brkyang // sna tshogs pad+ma nyi ma'i steng du gnas// phyogs dbang lus
26a6(rgyud 'grel): ni ji lta ba bzhin mnan// be ta l+ya dze dri khro gnyer ral pa gcig/ g+ho na skul byed sa bzang mchog chen po// mud gzhags pa gshin rje mthar byed sogs// de rnams bcu po mnyam du lha mo bsten// 'khor lo'i gtso dang gtsug tor gnod mdzes dang // de
26b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi g.yo 'dod pa'i rgyal po lnga// sla ra med cing de rnams cod pan ldan// yan lag rin chen rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// shin tu mdzes pa'i 'od sngon gyen du 'byung // khro dang bcas par bzhad pa'i zhal gsum ni// mche ba cung zad brtsigs
26b2(rgyud 'grel): shing spyan rnams dmar// shin tu mig zlum mi g.yo ba la sogs// yangs lta brdal brtan chos kun 'jigs med pa'o// gshin rje mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub pa// dbyug sngon dang ni de bzhin rta mgrin dang // stobs po che dang
26b3(rgyud 'grel): bgegs mthar byed bcas pa'i// drug po mig ser gzhan yang shin tu drag/ drag por lta bas snang ba thams cad 'dul// gsus bA 'phyang zhing thung la mig kyang zlum// shin tu lci bskyod khro gnyer 'jigs la drag/ smin ma g.yo zhing
26b4(rgyud 'grel): spyan bgrang zhal mche btsigs// khros pas rnam 'jigs ha ha zhes bzhad pa// smin ma sma ra sir zhing skra ser skya// cod pan med cing rus pa sbrul gyis brgyan// rkang pa'i phyogasu stog gi pags pa mnabs// skad cig gis ni 'gro
26b5(rgyud 'grel): pa za mthur ldan// drag po 'di rnams mgo bo'i cod pan ni// rigs ldan dang ni mtha' yas mdog gnag gyur// 'jog po zhes klu gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// de bzhin du ni sna cha dag tu 'gyur// de bzhin pad+ma zhes pa gser btso'i
26b6(rgyud 'grel): mdog/ 'di rnams kyis mdzes mgul ba'i do shal gyur// stobs rgyu pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'dra dkar ba// thugs rje ldan pa rnams kyi mchod phyir thogs// pad+ma dmar ba 'dra ba'i nor rgyas bu// 'od dpag dag gi rgyu ru bcing byas te// dung dang
27a1(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma dmar dang dkar ba gnyis// bang 'dra pad+ma'i rkang gdub gnyis su byas// g.yas phyogasu ni 'khor lo myur bar 'khor// khro bo'i tshogs de rnams ni mi 'gul lta// rtsibs rnon po yis yongs bcad dum bu yi// nyon mongs
27a2(rgyud 'grel): sa phyogs bdun rnams slar mi skye// dkon mchog gsum la 'di ru sun 'byin 'gyur// de la gats+tsha bo gnod mdzes kyi sngags kyis// da ni rnam par bzlog nas phyir phyogs// khro bo'i tsho gas de rnams ni bskyong bar byas// oM AHuSh+Ta Sha ba
27a3(rgyud 'grel): tsakra ban+ti sarba lI ki ka lo kot+ta ra yAn+na/ tan+t+ra mu la pra yo gI dI ni ma ma kr-i ta yai na ke na tsi ta kri tA tA ni tA ni/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ tshin+da tshon+da/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ ba tsa pa tsa/ kaM ba ya kaM ba ya/ bi d+h+r-i nA sa yau bi d+han sa ya/ shru taM sa ha
27a4(rgyud 'grel): swA/ bi tsur+N+Na ya bi tsur+N+Na ya/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya tsikra bar+t+ti/ bruM hUM/ de nas ji skad bshad pa'i bsgom pa'i rim pa yis// dgongs ka len gsum sngags 'dri bzlas par bya// sdang bar sems par byed pa de yi nI// de nyid kyis gru 'gyur te the tshom med/
27a5(rgyud 'grel): gshin rje mthar byed la sogs rang sprul pa// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i drag po spro bar bya// de rnams kyis kyang sna tshogs yongs khyab pas// bgegs dbang rnams kyis mgul nas thag pas bcings// oM suM b+ha'i sngags ni zhal bzhi
27a6(rgyud 'grel): pas// phyogs bzhi dag tu brjod nas bsrung bar bya// yongasu bsrungs nas khro bo'i tshogs sprul pas// shin tu khro dang bcas pa'i sdang mig gis// gtso bo'i rdo rje tho ba dbyug sogs kyis// rang gi lus kun rab tu brdung bar 'gyur// mdun du zhags
27b1(rgyud 'grel): bas drangs shing bsdams nas ni// sna tshogs sA la gdong yang sbyar bar byas// de nas 'od 'bar rdo rje phur bu yis// de steng rang gzugs ji lta bzhin du sprul// bsdus nas 'khor lo'i gtso bo'i bka' thob nas// khro dang bcas pa'o gnod mdzes lus kyis
27b2(rgyud 'grel): niT lag pa g.yon pa kun tu 'od ldan pas// snying rje med par khu tshur gyis bsdams te// bgegs tshogs de rnams mgon pos bsdus nas ni// phur bu gdab/ oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ge na dang / oM badz+ra la sogs bzlas pa'i tho ba yis// na mkha' bsdams shi
27b3(rgyud 'grel): khro drags lta stangs kyis// lag pa g.yas pas shin tu brdung bar bya// yongasu bsrung ba'i cho ga rdzogaso// de nyid gsum gyi sa bon dkar dmar gnag/ mgo dang zhag su ho sder gnyis dkyil bcug/ na mkha'i phyogs nas nor bu bzhin lhung ste// kha
27b4(rgyud 'grel): yi nang nas nang du rab tu zhugs// de nas snying rje ldan pas gzugs brtag pa// dngos po smig rgyu dbang po'i gzhu rang bzhin// bsgoms nas bdag med rang bzhin bsams nas ni// shU n+ya la sogs sngags rnams brjod par bya// ma rig pa'o// skad
27b5(rgyud 'grel): cig de la kha yi nang du zhugs// 'khor lo 'byung bas zla ba'i gzugasu gyur// de dbus hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje dmar// zla hUM rdo rje lngas byung kun tu bzang // zhal gsum de rnams kyi ni gnyis 'gyur phyag/ zhal ni gangs ri'i mdog 'dra gnag dang
27b6(rgyud 'grel): dmar// rdo rje ral g.yas nor bu pad+ma g.yon// phyag gnyis kyis ni rang gi rig ma 'khyud// g.yas pas g.yas min brla yi rgyab mnan cing // g.yon pas g.yas pa yongasu mnan pa yis// sna tshogs pad+ma la ni skyil krung bcings// rdzogs
28a1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas bcas 'og steng phreng ba 'phro// kun tu bzang las byung ba'i chos kyi dbyings// rdo rje gsum stong dkar po'i gru gsum ste// hUM ser gyis sbrul zab mo dbus su ni// baM ser de las byung ba'i sna tshogs pad// bad steng kham ltang
28a2(rgyud 'grel): de las byung ba yi// sna tshogs rdo rje phyogs bcur rig 'od 'gyed// rdo rje'i steng byung 'khor lo dkar po rtsibs bcu gnyis// rten 'brel las ni krinaH byung ba yi// phyag ga yas 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kyis mtshan pa'i// rig bcas rnam par snang mdzad
28a3(rgyud 'grel): blta bar bya// kun tu bzang po'i rang gzugs ji lta bzhin// 'di yi 'od zer mkha' dbyings rnam spros pas// mnang med me chen la sogs rnam par zhi// sems can rnams kyi 'dod pa phun tshogs grub// de bsdus bdag nyid zla ba sa bon la// spro bsdu
28a4(rgyud 'grel): yang byas las byung sangs rgyas sku// sna tshogs rigs kyi bye brag tha dad pa'i// rgyal ba'i sku las byung ba'i sna tshogs 'od// mthu yis de la dkyil 'khor dag tu gyur// zur bzhi pa la shin tu mdzes par byas// de la sgo rnams de bzhin rta babs
28a5(rgyud 'grel): khyams// zla ba dra phyed rin chen mdzes rnams dang // rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan dril bu dang // ye shes dam pa bsod nams tshogs gnyis kyi// gtso ma'i gser gyi rang bzhin bum pa bzang // mdzes pa rnams kyi nang dang phyi rol bzhag/ rdo rje rdo rje
28a6(rgyud 'grel): phyed pa rtse lngas brgyan// sna tshogs g.yer ka dril bu'i sgra rnams dang // me long dang bcas rnga ya ba rnams kyis brgyan// 'khor lo rin chen chu skyes ral gris mtshan// ka ba brgyad can de ni rnam dgu ldan// sgo yi phyogs gnyis kyis ni ka ba ni// ri dgas gnyis
28b1(rgyud 'grel): dbus chos kyi 'khor lo'o// rdo rje 'dzin pas 'khor lo byas shing zlum// de yi phyi rol kun tu 'ong tshogs 'khyil// 'du byed do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang de rnams kyi// pAM las
28b2(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan// 'gro ba ma lus nye bar 'khrul pas na// rnam par dag pa'i pad+ma'i gdan rnams yin// r-i las byung ba'i nyi mo bdun du gyur// oM las byung ba'i rgyas pa'i zla bcu gnyis// nyon mongs thams cad nges par bsregs pa'i phyir//
28b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i nyi ma bdun du gyur// bsod nams kun gyi myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir// zla ba'i gdan rnams dag ni byung ba yin// dbus su zla ba dbang po'i phyogasu 'ang zla// yongs su lhag pa'i phyog su'ang nyi ma gsum// zur bzhi mtsham su'ang zla
28b4(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba nye bar mdzes// phyi rol zur bzhi dang ni mtshams rnams dang // shar gyi sgo yi g.yon dang g.yas gnyis su// so so so so yi ni zla ba'i gzugs// sgo rnams de nyid du ni nyi ma bzhi// de bzhin dbus su zla ba'i ste du ni//
28b5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ni rnam par bsgom// g.yon pa'i zla 'dir yi ge bcu drug sogs// g.yas pa'i zla gyur ka sogs ha mthar thug/ zla bcas de la wa ya la gsum dang // a ka ba oM de la rab tu sbyar// de dag rnams ni nyis 'gyur
28b6(rgyud 'grel): rnams su bya// gang gyur de gnyis A li kA li zla// lugasu byung dang lugs las bzlog par bshad// dbyangs yig rnams dkar phreng ni gnyis su gyur// pha rol gsal byed rnams ni 'di ru dmar// de gnyis dbus su raM ni rnam par bsam// /
29a1(rgyud 'grel): zhu bas gnyi ga gcig gyur 'od kyi tshogs// 'od tshogs hUM b+hung hUM lngas rdo rje dmar// de yi dbus su zla gyur sa bon steng // b+hU hUM rdo rje las byung zla dbus su// ye shes rang bzhin las byung rdzogs par gyur// sku la sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan
29a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang zhing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus yang dag sbas// me long ye shes la sogs nang dri ni// sngags rnams lnga po 'di dag legs par sbyar// oM sogs tsaM ta pra ti bya d+ha ka/ de srid mtha' mar de bzhin legs par brjod// kun gzhi rnam par shes bya
