29a3(rgyud 'grel): pa gzhan gyur pa// zla gnyis 'dus gyur pa yi rnam snang mdzad// me long ye shes rang bzhin de gcig go// nyon mongs yid kyi rnam shes gzhan gyur pa// 'od tshogs gang yin de yang rin chen 'byung // de ni ye shes gnyis pa mnyam nyid gyur// rnam par rtog/
29a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i shes pa gzhan gyur pa// hUM byung rdo rje 'dzin pa 'od dpag med// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'di gsum pa// 'jug pa'i rnam par mas / na gyur pa// rdo rje'i dbus kyi sa bon don yod grub// bya ba nan tan grub 'di bzhi pa yin// rang gi rnam pa
29a5(rgyud 'grel): shes pa gzhan gyur pa// ye shes rnam bzhi rang bzhin gang yin gcig/ de ni ye shes lnga par 'di du bshad// spro dang bsdu ba thams cad las byung ngo'i// rnam dag gnyis med chos dbyings rdo rje sems// zhal gsum dbus dang yan lag thad dkan+ta//
29a6(rgyud 'grel): g.yas dang g.yon gnyis zhal gnyis sngo dang dmar// rdo rje ral gri g.yas na rin chen pad+ma g.yon// phyag gnyis kyis ni rig ma 'khyud pa'o// nyes pa thams cad 'bigs pas rdo rje ste// las dang ma rig kun gcod phyir ral gri/ 'gro ba tham cad
29b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi ni bsam pa rnams// yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir ni rin chen no// 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang 'dam kun gyi// ma gos par gyur pa'i phyir ni pad+ma'o// 'di ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'o// srid gsum 'jig rten de ni nang gnas shing // dngos po
29b2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad ro gcig chos kyi dbyings// rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yum// mtshan ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// 'dod chags la sogs kyis gdungs chus khengs pa'i// 'gro ba chu bo bzhi yis kun tu bdas// nga rgyal la sogs
29b3(rgyud 'grel): dba' rlabs pha rol ngogs// thig ring klong du las kyi rlung gis shin tu bdas// byams pa phun sum tshogs pa'o// sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa mthong nas ni// snying rje'i ting 'dzin rgya cher bskyed par bya// thabs dang rig pa dgyes pa'i
29b4(rgyud 'grel): sgra rnams kyis// mkha' la sangs rgyas sems can degyes pa bskyed// 'od zer dro spros pas ni drangs pa'i mgon po rnams// kha yi dra bas nang du gzhug par bya// zhu gyur rdo rje lam byung gsang byung 'gyur// phyi na gnas pa'i lha mo rnams pa
29b5(rgyud 'grel): dgu/ rim bzhin spos dang bdug pa mar me dang // dri dang de bzhin me long la sogs lnga// mchod pa bya phyir lag na thogs par blta// lha mo rnams dang rang nyid rdo rje sems// dang po spyan la sogs pa spro bar bya// gzugs la sogs pa lha mo
29b6(rgyud 'grel): kun kyang 'byung // slar bcug thams cad rdo rje lam phyung nas// pad+ma sgo ru nges par 'bab 'gyur te// gsang ba'i lte ba'i zla dbus gzhug par bya// 'od zer de byung bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bskyed nas srid pa gsum na gnas pa yi// seMn
30a1(rgyud 'grel): gang yin thams cad gzhug par bya// snying rje phun sum tshogs pa'o// rdo rje bcom nas pad+ma legs phye ba'i// de yi 'od kyis sangs rgyas spyan drangs nas// khar gzhug rdo rje lam ni byung gyur pa// rgyal ba la sogs zla ba zhus dbang
30a2(rgyud 'grel): bskur// mig la sogs pa drug dang gzugs rdo rje// spyan la sogs dang bde bar gshegs pa lnga// de bzhin gzhan yang khro bo bzhi rnams dang // de dag rnams ni rang gi gzugasu gyur// dga' ba phun sum tshogs pa'o// stong gsum chen po'i
30a3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten khams gnas gyur// phyi rol sems can gzhan dag dga' med pa// k+Shi la sogs pa'i sa bon gyis spro ste// de rnams thams cad byang chub la gzhol byas// gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o// sems can don du smon lam byas
30a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// gang yin de ni bdag gis yongasu bkang // 'gro ba mya ngan 'das par 'dul don phyir// stong pa nyid du rab gzhug bzhed par gyur// rnam par shes pa'o// btang snyoms yongasu rdzogs pa'o// oM dang AHhUM dkar zhing dmar dang gnag/
30a5(rgyud 'grel): 'od ser ho gnyis kyi ni dbus gnas pa// kha yi nang bzhugs pad+ma'i dbus gnas te// mgon po rig ma gnyi ga zhu bar byas// 'das dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi// sems can ngag tu gyur pa gang cung zad// de rnams rgyu gang gis ni
30a6(rgyud 'grel): yongs grol ba'i// mgon po bzhugs pa stong nyid rab zhugs gyur// gang rnams thog ma med pa'i dus dbus bsgom// thogs med dus mtha' nas ni mi g.yo ba'i// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gzugs kyi lha mo rnams// rdo rje thugs khyod la sogs//
30b1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi yis// rang gi glu rnams kyi ni yang dag bskul// rdo rje rdzogs la stong nyid yang dag sbyangs// maM bsam snga ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gyur// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i gdan dbus su// zla ba bcu gnyis dang ni nyi ma bdun// de dbus pad+ma
30b2(rgyud 'grel): zla ba'i gdan dbus su// maM las byung ba'i ral gri rnam par bsam// ral gri steng du yang ni zla maM ste// ral gri zla maM las byung 'jam rdo rje// ming dang gzugaso// rang gi zhal dang rang gi gur gum mdog/ g.yas pa sngo zhing g.yas pa min pa paN+Da/
30b3(rgyud 'grel): ral gri mda' dang ut+pal gzhu rnams shing // de yi phyag gnyis shes rab kun tu 'khyud// shes rab rnam dag ngo bo ral gri ste// chos rnams 'bigs par byed pa nyid kyis ni// rnam par dag pa'i thabs kyi ngo bo mnga'// sems can thams
30b4(rgyud 'grel): cad tshim par byed pas nA// ut+pal sngon po nyes kun gnyen po dang // yon tan thams cad 'dzin par byed pa'i gzhu// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog rnaMs kyis brgyan cing // yid du 'ong ba'i rin chen mchog gis brgyan// sangs rgyas lngar byas bdag
30b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis lus la spro// rI rab bzhin du mi g.yo dpal gyis mdzes// rang gi sa bon dkyil 'khor dbus su 'am// yang na gzhan ci 'dod pa'i tsho gas mgon// de nyid kyis ni gnas su gyur pa ste// dkyil 'khor dbang po de yi gzugs 'ja
30b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa'i sems nyid med// oM d+harmA d+hA tu la sogs sngags brjod de// brjod pa tsam gyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni// de 'dir bsnyen pa'i yan lag rdzogs byas pa'i// mig gnyis nang dang rna ba sna dang lce// yan lag
31a1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa brang dang zla gnas drug/ k+ShuM dzAM de bzhin khaM gaM de nas yaM// shAM saM yi gre drug nyid rnam par bsgom// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri dang ni rdo rje rim bzhin du// phyag mtshan de rnams yang dag byung ba dang // mtshan
31a2(rgyud 'grel): ma de rnams dbus su zla sa bon// phyag mtshan zla ba sa bon bcas byung ba'i// yan lag sa bon dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan rig/ drug po brla gnyis rdo rje skyil krung gis// zla bcas sna tshogs pad+ma kun tu gnas// sa dbang rdo rje'i dbang po lag na rin// 'jig/
31a3(rgyud 'grel): rten dbang phyug sgrib sel kun tu bzang // dkar dang sngo dang de bzhini ser dang dmar// ljang dang skya dang gzhan yang de la sogs// sa yi dbang phyug gzugs kyi rdo rje 'khyud// rdo rje dbang po yang ni sgra rdo rjes// nam mkha'i snying po'i dri yi rdo rjes 'khyud// /
31a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dbang phyug dang ni ro yis te// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba reg pas 'khyud// chos kyis 'khyud pa yang ni kun tu bzang // de rnams bcu gnyis phyi nang dbye ba las// skye mched de rnams rnam par dag pa'o// gzugs rdor la sogs lha mo de
31a5(rgyud 'grel): dag rnams// gang yin phun tshogs skye mched dkyil 'khor gnas// de dag rnams la 'khyud 'gyur de bzhin du// bzlog pas gnas tshe thams cad de bzhin gyur// de bzhin rtag tu bsgom pa bsgom bdag nyid// skad cig la ni mngon shes drug thob 'gyur//
31a6(rgyud 'grel): pha rol phyin drug rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor par// gyur te nye ba yi ni sgrub pa rdzogs// reg pa'o// rdo rje gsum rdzogs nges par gnas don du// zla gsum snying ga lkog ma mgo bor yang // brang dang lkog ma'i bar du bzhi pa dgod// sna tshogs pad+ma
31b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa'i dbus gnas pa'i// hUM gis rdo rje las byung thugs rdo rje// a yi pad+ma las byung khyad 'phags ngag/ oM gyi 'khor lo yis ni sku rdo rje// maM gi ral gri las byung 'jam rdo rje// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul pa yi// sku gsum rnam
31b2(rgyud 'grel): par grol ba'i bdag nyid de// nges dbyings ye shes rang bzhin bzhi pa'o// sngon po dmar po dang ni dkar dang ser// dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che// ngag rdo rje'i sku 'khyud tshes phyag rgya// dam pa'i sku yi rdo rje las phyag rgya// 'jam dbyangs//
31b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid 'khyud dam tshig phyag rgya'o// de rnams bzhi po zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// rdo rje'i skyil krung gis kyang shin tu gnas// phyag rgya rnams kyis so so'i dbus su mi/ 'di ltar bsgoms par bya zhes la la 'chad// de rnams kyi ni dbus 'di lta yang //
31b4(rgyud 'grel): raM baM yaM l-i la sogs yi ge dgod par bya// 'di rnams bzhi po rdzogs par gyur pa dang // me chu rlung dang dbang gi dkyil 'khor rnams// dmar po gru gsum dkar zhing zlum pa dang // gzhu 'od sngon po ser po gru bzhi pa'o// mdung dang bum pa ba dan
31b5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yis// go rim ji bzhin de rnams mtshan par 'dod// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su rang sa bon// dmar ba phyag mtshan zla ba la gnas nyis 'gyur bya// mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams dang gdan la sogs// thugs rdo rje dang 'dra bar de rdzogs/
31b6(rgyud 'grel): bya// rig ma spangs shing phyag gnyis zhal gcig ste// cod pan mtshon cha rgyan med de rnams ni// sngar gsungs dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni// rnam par bsgom par bya zhes gzhan rnams 'chang // sems kyi 'od zer tshogs las rang byung
32a1(rgyud 'grel): ba li/ shes rab yan lag gis 'khyud gsal ba'i thugs// rgyal ba'i dbang po'i zhing rnams yang dag mchog/ rang gi lus ngag yid gsum byin gyis brlab/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang zhes thugs brjod de// chos kyi gsung lam zhes
32a2(rgyud 'grel): bshad gsungs brjod de// de bzhin dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang sku ste// de ltar sngags brjod 'di ni sgrub yan lag/ sngags spangs brjod de sems kyis dbang bskur te// dpal ldan ye shes sems dpa' rtag tu bskul// gang phyir 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyud gsung//
32a3(rgyud 'grel): shes rab rno can de rnams kyis rab sgrub// tshor ba'o// bdag gos bdag snying ye shes 'od tshogs kyis// mkha'i bzhugs rgyal ba ma lus yang dag bskul// de yi lus nang byung ba'i 'od zer las// gzugs sogs rdo rje rang byung gzhan yang ni//
32a4(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan mA ma kI dang gos dkar cin// sgrol ma zhes bya lha mo de rnams ni// rnga yi sgra ldan rnams kyi sgra sgrogs shing // byug pa la sogs me tog phreng thogs shing // gser gyi bum pa ye shes chus grang ba// bkra shis bum pa lag thogs glu rnams/
32a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis// rang gtso cod pan thogs shing mkhas dkyil gnas// mchog tu dbang bskur bar ni dbab par bya// bab 'gyur de nyid las ni byung ba yi// mi baspyod rdo rje cod pan dag tu gnas// mthong na shin tu sems ni rnam dag par// gyur pa de nyid sgrub
32a6(rgyud 'grel): ba chen po'o// srid pa'o// rig ma mtshan mchog yon tan kun ldan pa// rang gi sa bon las byung kun tu brtag/ dkyil 'khor mngon sum du ni rab tu bzhag/ de la bsnyen pa la sogs nges byas bdag/ sa snying la sogs rnams kyis gang bar blta//
32b1(rgyud 'grel): sku la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyi lus// de 'dir chos lnga sbyar bar gyur pa yis// glo bur las byung lus ni kun tu gang // mgo snying lte ba rked pA bad+ma gnyis su// oM hUM swA AHhA zhes go rim bzhin// de rnams mdog ni bye brag gshes nas
32b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rnam dgod rigs lnga ru ni rab tu bya// a las byung ba'i gsang ba'i lte bar ni// hU~M las sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi// nor bu oM dang rang gi rdo rje hUM// sbubs gnyis su ni yi ge phaT bsgom bya// de 'og oM sarba ta thA ga ta zhes// a nu
32b3(rgyud 'grel): rA ga nu 'khyud gnyis su bya// len pa'o// de nas sngaru bshad dbang bskur shes byas nas// rig dang lhan cig 'di ru dga' bar bya// srid pa'o// drang por bsnyen pa'i yan lag de nas nyer sgrub pa// sgrub pa'i yan lag chen po la sogs kyang /
32b4(rgyud 'grel): rtul po la sogs sbyor byas so sor ni// 'gyur te bzhi ru yang ni bshad par grags// rtul sogs rgyu mthun rnam smin skyes bu byed// dbang gis 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ru bzhag/ bsnyen pa'i yan lag nas brtsams bya ba nas// thabs las
32b5(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i bya ba rnam pa pade// shes rab kyi 'gyur de bzhin cho ga rnams// bsnyen pa'i yan lag la sogs dbang du sgyur mtha'// sgyu mthun la sogs baHsra pa dbus kyi mying // yan lag bzhir 'gyur dang po'i sbyor ba'o// snying ka ri/
32b6(rgyud 'grel): dibus gnas pa'i sngags 'od kyis// rgyal ba'i dbang po'i skyi la ma lum gzhug/ bde ba chen po las byung byang chub sems// hUM rdor lis byung dkyil 'khor dkyil dbang dgod// skye ba'o// dwe ra ra tI bcas pa'i thugs rje ste sIn+da nIs pa sa/
33a1(rgyud 'grel): byas lus 'chang zhing // zhe sdang rdo rje ngo bo sna tshogs pad+ma la// bzhugs pa'i badz+ra d+h+r-i ka ni zla dbus su// rga shi'o// blo 'khor ba las ni dzin dza~M kau ga tsa~M gau/ rnam par snang mdzod gauti mug 'dra rang bzhin// zla ba bya ba ya ni 'od gsal ba// shar
33a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs zla dbus mo ha ra tir bcas// oM gyi rin chen las byung gser gtso'i 'od// rin dbang mgon po badz+ra ra tir bcas// nga rgyal gtso bo rat+na d+h+r-ika ces pa// 'di gdan nyi ma'i steng bzhugs lho phyogs// dz+r-IM gi pad+ma las byung mtshal mdog 'ong // 'dod cha/
33a3(rgyud 'grel): la bzhugs mgon po 'od dpag med// rA ga ra tis dam 'khyud a ro li ka/ nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs 'gyur nub phyogs su// khaM gi ral gri lis byung mdog mchog ldang // phrag dog rang bzhin de yang don yod grub// nu ma gnyis brten badz+ra ra tir bcas//
33a4(rgyud 'grel): bradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka ces byung phyogs nyi dbus su// ye shes lnga phung rnam par dag pa'o// lam gyi 'khor lo las byung mtsham su ni// rnam par snang mdzad mdog 'dra zla dkyil nas// sgeg pa'i cha byang rgyal la rab tu chags// mo ha ra ti gang yan de nyid spyan// me gi
33a5(rgyud 'grel): ut+pal dmar po'i phyag mtshan byung // mi bskyod pa 'dra gshin rje'i phyogs zla dbus// rtag tu dang po'i sangs rgyas thabs gcig sbyor// dwe Sha ra ti mA ma kI gzhan min// paM gi pad+ma las byung zla dbus su// snang ba mtha' yas mdog 'dra rlung gi phyogs//
33a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma'i mgon po yis ni kun tu 'khyud// gos dkar gang yin rA ga ra ti'ang de// taM gi ut+pal gser las byung gyur pa// rin dbang 'od 'dra badz+ra ra ti sgrol// dpal ldan phyogasu zla ba la gnas shing // don yod rdo rje'i yan lag gis 'khyud byas// 'byung ba
33b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po bzhi rnam par dag pa'o// phyi rol byung nas me yi phyogasu ni// skor phyogs de nyid kyi ni nang du'ang // zla ba drug dbus rang gi phyag mtshon rgyu// 'od ldan yi ge drug po mthong nas ni// mtshams de rnamasu dzaM hU~M ba~M hau dang // kha~M ro shar gyi sgor gyur phyog/
33b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su// me long pi paM dkar po dri dung chos// ro yi snod yang sna tshogs gos mkha' dbyings// sa bon bsams pa'i mtshan ma de mthong nas// gzugs rdo rje sogs lha mo de rnams drug/ de rnams sa bon la sogs mdog 'dra zhing // lus la rtag/
33b3(rgyud 'grel): tu de nyid gsum bsam bya// pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag pa'o// raM hUM nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// hUM gi sa bon mtshan byung khro bo'i gzugs// ji skad bshad pa'i khro ba'i tshogs nang gnas// bsgom bya de rnams rtag tu g.yas//
33b4(rgyud 'grel): brkyang bzlog/ mya ngan 'das srid rnam dag g.yas brkyang ba'o// gshin rje mthar byed dbang po zhes bya'i skor// shes rab mthar byed nyi ma lnga skyes phyogs// pad+ma mthar byed klu yi gtso bo'i phyogs// bgegs mthar byed pa rnam thos
33b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs na gnas// dad pa la sogs pa bzhi rnam par dgra pa'o// gshin rje mthar byed de'i pa ti li// shes rab mthar byed gzhan gyis mi thub ma// pad+ma mthar byed lhan cig khro gnyer can// bgegs mthar byed pa ral pa gcig
33b6(rgyud 'grel): mar dmigs// ma lus 'khor lo sna tshogs pad+ma la// nyi zla'i dbus su ji lta ba bzhin bzhugs// zhi ba'i gzugs can gang yin 'dir lha rnams// de rnams thams cad rdo rje skyil krung gyur// ting 'dzin chen po thob pas shin tu zhi// bdud
34a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams bzhi las mchog tu rgyal gyur pas// rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje sbrul krung ngo // sangs rgyas sogs gzhan lha mo rnams bcas pa// dgyes pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa rnam par sbyar// dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor
34a2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo yi// zhal 'di rnams kyi zhal ni nges par blta// rigs rnams dang po'i rigs ni rdo rje'i rigs// de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen rigs gsum pa// de nas pad+ma'i rigs ni bzhi pa ste// sna tshogs rigs ni la lar las kyi rigs//
34a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon po la sogs gang yin mdog lnga yang // de mdog tha dad pas ni rigs rnams lnga// sems can bsam pa tha dad mdog tha dang // rigs las rang byung sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku// de rnams yan lag mchog rnams gsum gyis brgyan// /
34a4(rgyud 'grel): sku gsung thugs ni rnam dag zhal gsum pa'o// sngon po dkar po gnyis kyis g.yon pa dmar// g.yas pa gnyis mdog rnam par zlog pa'o// ser po dang ni dmar po ljang gu'i sku// g.yas min dang ni g.yas pa dkar dang sngo// rigs kyi lha mo
34a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag rnams kyi ni// zhal gyi mdog rnams kyang ni so sor gyur// de rnams phyag drug dang ni yang dag ldan// gtso bo'i phyag gnyis kyis ni mtshon cha spangs// lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur ni// so so so sor nges bcings de 'og tu// mthe'u chung
34a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo lcags kyu'i gzugs kyis ni// lag pa gnyis kyis mkhrig ma gnyis ni sbyar// gnas ldan gang yin la ni phyi rol gyis// de yi phang dbus 'dug 'gyur des mgul phyogs// g.yon pa'i nang du lag gnyis phyi rol gyur// gcig la gcig
34b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khyud phyag rgya bcings par bya// pha rol phyin drug rnam dag phyag drug po// bka te ne bka tAM ba ri tsum pa ma na// dan+te shA na taM ba ri g+hi sha ma na// thabs dang rig pa'i yan lag mi phyed par// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rgyal po'i rnam par bsgom// ngo bo
34b2(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyis rnam dag 'khyud pa'o// gang yang phyag mtshan mchog las byung gang yin// mtshan ma mchog de lag pa g.yas su ste// phyag gsum thams cad la ni ral gri'o// ral gri las byung 'khor la 'dzin 'gyur te// rin chen rigs kyi
34b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa pad+mar gyur// de bzhin pad+ma rigs kyi rin chen te// 'di gnyis kyis ni gsum par 'khor lor gyur// gzhan rnams kun gyi lag pa nor bu pad// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par dag pa dang // shes rab pha rol rnam dag phyag
34b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mo// rgyal ba lnga po rnams kyi ral pa'i tshogs// 'dir ni de rnams bye brag gcig yod 'gyur// zhi ba rnams ni rin 'bar cod pan thogs// khro bo rnams ni sbrul gyis sku brgyan cing // dpung pa lag ngar rked pa rkang pa dag/ mgrin pa
34b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ni rna ba mgor thogs pa// 'od ldan nor bus spras pas gser gyis bcings// ji lta ji ltar yan lag rgyan gyis brgyan// thabs kyir gyur pa gang yin shes rab kyi// phyag dang mdog dang mtshon tshwa gos 'byung ba// gnas dang gan
34b6(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi gang dang gang // de rnams kyang ni bar gyur pa yir gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di ni gsang 'gyur rnam par bsam// byung nas de yang go rim ji lta bzhin// yig gsum badz+ra d+h+r-ika sogs sngags rnams kyis// dam tshig la sogs pa dang /
35a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs gcig bya// mi bskyod rdo rje snying gar thugs rdo rje// rab zhugs na mkha' dang mnyam ngo bo nyid// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs gzhan rnams kyang // gsang ba'i myang bshad gang yin phyogs rnams su'o// de dbus sngags
35a2(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'od zer rnams byung nas// gshin rje mthar byed ltar gyur na mkhar gnas// rdo rje lcags kyus 'khor lo drangs nas ni// de nas mdun gyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bya// rdzogs nas yon chab mchog bkang pad+ma'i snod// lag pa gnyis kyis kun tu bzung
35a3(rgyud 'grel): nas kyang // de nas lag pa g.yon pas ba dan bzung // lag pa g.yas pa yis ni tsan dan mdzes// me tog chu sogs kyis mdzes bdud rtsi lnga// rang gi snying sogs bzlas pa'i mchod pa 'bul// gshin rje mthar byed la sogs thams
35a4(rgyud 'grel): cad kyang // dza zhes lhag par smra zhing srung bar byed// de bzhin khro gzhan rang gi las kyi mtha'// hUM baM ho bcas pa yi sgra sgrogs shing // gzhan gyis mi thub pad+ma bgegs mthar byed// rab bzhugs bcing ba dang ni dgyes par byed// zhes
35a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i bar gyur 'di ltar lhag bsnyen pa// lhag pa'i rgyu mthun 'bras bu dang lhan cig/ de nas thams cad kun tu dgyes pa dang // mig la sogs pa'i yan lag byin gyis brlab// sku sogs tshigs gsum gyis ni byin brlabs te// dbang
35a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur byas pa'i dus kyi mtha' bar gnas// de rnams rimo gyis gnas pa'i bar du ni// lhag pa'i 'bras bu gsum bcas yan lag go/ rang gi sems las kun 'byung 'od chen 'phros// nam mkha'i rgyal dang rig ma kun nas drangs// na mkha'i
35b1(rgyud 'grel): khyab par gdan la bzhugs par gyur// rang gi bdag po bcings nas cod pan bcings// gshin rje mthar byed pad mthar rdo rje gzhan// khro bo bgegs sgra rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas// nga rgyal bzhi po sems bdag 'jam dbyangs bcas// kun
35b2(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang dang phyag na rdo rje dang // dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' chos dbyings dang // dpal ldan dwe/ Sha rang bcos sgra rdo rje// 'di rnams cod pan rdo rje mi bskyod pa// mi bskyod rdo rje'i steng du rdo rje sems// sa snying sku dbang dang ni gzugs rdo rje// gshin
35b3(rgyud 'grel): rje mthar byed mo ha ra ti rnams// 'di rnams kyi ni spyi bor rnam snang bzhugs// mkha' snying dri yi steng du rin chen tog/ ngag rdor 'jig rten dbang phyug dri dang ro// pad mthar phyin rnams cod pan 'od dpag med// reg rdor sgrib sel badz+ra ra ti
35b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams// spyi bor yang ni don yod grub pa bzhugs// rang gi sa bon pad+ma'i nang gnas bya'i// 'od kyis kyang ni phyag rgya lnga drangs nas// kha yi nang zhugs gsang ba'i dbus gnas te// zhu nas de las gzugs la sogs par gyur// sku rdor la so /
35b5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan ma de lha mo// me long sogs gang yin de las byung spros// gzhan yang phyi rol me tog bdug spros sogs// de rnams nam mkha' la ni gdugs bzhin gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga tA dang // pU dza la sogs sgra yi sngags brjod cing // mi
35b6(rgyud 'grel): bskyod rdo rje la sogs tshigs bcad lnga// brjod nas de nas mngon nga rnam bsam pa// yaM las byung ba'i 'od sngon bzhur byas nyid// rgyal mtshan gyis mtshan rang gi dkyil 'khor la// de nas raM byung shin tu mdog dmar ba'i// gru gsum
36a1(rgyud 'grel): gyen gnas me yi tshogs kyis gnan// de nas me yi steng du 'od dmar aM// de las byung ba'i pad+ma'i snod mchog bsam// rnam pa bco lnga rdzas kyis yongs gang ba'i// bdud rtsi lnga la sa bon lnga rnams kyis// oM hUM zla ba gnyis ni mkha
36a2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil gnas// zhu nas de yi nang du lhung bar gyur// skol bas oM ni tshur gyur kun tu blta// hUM gi sa bon las byung rdo rje nang // rdo rjes dkrugs pas rnam par zhu gyur pa// yi ge hUM bzlas ye shes bdud rtsir gyur// de las gzhan pa yi ni snod rnams kun// /
36a3(rgyud 'grel): thas cad rang gi lag na thogs par spro// lce yi rtse mor hUM byung rdo rje dkar// snying la gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rgyal// thams cad kun tu tshim par bsam par bya// dkyil 'khor dam pa'i mchog 'gyur ting 'dzin no// gang yang 'jam dbyang
36a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje thugs ka yaM// sems dpa'i snying po las byung ba 'jam rol gri/ maM las byung ba'i sems kyi me bsgoms te// rdo rje gsum sku dang yang mnyam por byung // de rnams snying nas rang mtshan sa bon las// byung nas ye shes 'od zer rab gsal
36a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i// 'od kyis ma lus sna tshogs kun tu gang // ye shes bdud rtsi rgyun gyis rjes song nas// 'jig rten khams rnams thams cad rgal nas kyang // rnal 'byor bdud rtsi gzhan dang gzhan bsdus nas// 'og tu gdong ltas nas ni de byung ba/
36a6(rgyud 'grel): skad cig gis ni 'jig rten gsum bcas rgyal// ma lus sna tshogs sangs rgyas nyid byas nas// 'ongs nas spyi bo'i nang du rab tu zhugs// lus kun tshim par kun tu gyur nas ni// tha gcig de la yang ba'i rang bzhin gyur// de nyid gsum mchod
36b1(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du bya// maM gi nang du ra bzhugs rnam par blta// ma las byung gyur ral gri dbus su ni// zla gnas tsa na ka tsam thig ler gnas// de dbus dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor gyi dbang po// nyi shur gcig gis ma tshang de rnam dag/ gang dang gang gis skyo med
36b2(rgyud 'grel): de bsgoms te// mngon sum byas nas thig le'i sbyor ba'o// rang gi lha yi sa bon las byung 'od 'phros pas// phyi rol gyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// chos 'byung zhes bya'i sna yi rtse mor bzhugs// yang dag byang chub sems byung 'jam ral
36b3(rgyud 'grel): gri/ yang na 'khor lo pad+ma rdo rje 'am// nas kyi tshad dam zla ba'i dbus su ni// de yi steng du mi byung mdog lnga pa'i// yungs kar tshad tsam rin chen zur brgyad pa// rin chen 'bras bu raM las byas pa'i 'khor lo nyid// gang yin de gyur rnal 'byor/
36b4(rgyud 'grel): shes mchog gis// rdo rje sogs mtshan de bzhin gshegs rnams kyi// de rnams nyid dang mtshan ma spro bar bya// mtshan ma brtan por byas pas brtags na ni// 'od zer du ba'i 'od dang de bzhin gzhan// me khyer 'od dang snang ba chen po
36b5(rgyud 'grel): ste// rim gyis mthar thug phra mo'i sbyor ba'o// rngub pa dang ni gnas dang ring du gyur// sdud dang gang ba dang ni 'dzin pa rnams// 'ong ba dang ni rjes dran sngon grub rnams// srog ma bsdams par gyur pa gang yin dag/ oM dang dbugs de mnyam du
36b6(rgyud 'grel): nang du zhugs// a'i sngags dang thabs gcig dbus na gnas// hUM gi mthar ni rang gi sgra dang ldan// bzlas pa kan dang mchu sbyar spangs par bya// de nyid sa bon las 'dir sangs rgyas spro// 'od zer tshogs de na mkhar song nas kyang // de nas
37a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i lha mo de rnams kyis// dam tshig zhes bya'i 'khor lo mchod par byed// thams cad kun tu 'khyud par gyur pa dang // dga' ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas rnams 'khyud 'gyur// de nas rang byas snying ka'i sems rdo rje// skad
37a2(rgyud 'grel): cig de la thub dbang zhugs par blta// gal te bsgoms dang bzlas pas skyo gyur na// rang gi snying ga'i de nyid rnams bsgoms pas// rig ma'i tshogs 'ongs nas ni glu yi sgras// de dang de yis 'khor lo mchog sang byas// mgo bo pags
37a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i mtho gang tsam du ni// ma lus yongasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba dgod// bdud rtsi lnga rnams oM dang ldan pa ni// zhu bas skad cig de la rang lus bab// bsam bya gangs chu bsil 'dra bab gyur pas// ma lus skyo ba rnam par bsal bar bya// de nas
37a4(rgyud 'grel): thangs cig de yis ngal bsngos nas// slar yang de yis gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// gong du bshad pa'i dbang bskur mchod pa dang // bstod pa la sogs smon lam mthar thug brjod// byas nas gang dag gang rigs rab 'byung ba'o// de ni de
37a5(rgyud 'grel): dang de yi snying gar gzhug/ de nyid gsum tshig gis ni byin brlabs bya// gnas nas thogs med ye shes gnyis med tshul// de la gshegs gsol gleng gzhi de rnams ni// las rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin no// de khas langs nas
37a6(rgyud 'grel): ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid chen por rang lha'i rnam pa gzung // snang ba tsam du yul de mthong nas ni// sku tshogs rdo rje bdag nyid dngos rnams dag/ rang gi sa bon las byung yongs rdzogs pa'i// 'khor lo rang gi snying zlar zhugs par
37b1(rgyud 'grel): bas ma// ra las byung ba'i me yang bsgom par bya// zan zar gyur pa'i tshe nu 'di skad gsungs// sngar bshang rlung dang me dang dgos dbus su// rdo rje la sogs cho ga bzhin byas nas// sku sogs lha rnams kun tu tshim par bya// nang gi bdag nyid kyi ni
37b2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg las// mthar thug par yang sems kyi bya ba ste// phung po la sogs bud shing kun tu ldan// ye shes me 'bar ba yi phung po ni// bsregs pa gang yin dri ni bla med bshad// ma lus 'dod pa yi ni cho ga nyid// de yis rang gi lha yi
37b3(rgyud 'grel): rnam par bsgom par bya// rang dang gzhan lus la yang kun tu mchod// sangs rgyas rnams bstan dam tshig shin tu thob// rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro ba'i don byas shing // de bzhin gshegs rnams kun tu mchod par bsam// sems ni gcig/
37b4(rgyud 'grel): tu mnyam par bzhag gyur pas// lus la sogs pa'i las rnams rtag tu bya// gang yang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las// dga' bsdu thams cad nyin mtshan rab byed pa// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtags par// sangs rgyas
37b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog rnams kyis ni rab tu gsungs// ji ltar dngos po gcig la rnam par rtog/ dpag med 'byung 'gyur bud med mthong ba lngas// kyi dung 'dod pa can dang rang byung gsum// bde dang sdug bsngal rnam par grol ba'i sems// lus la
37b6(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i dge dang mi dga'i las// gang phyir de ni sems kyi dbang gis gsungs// de bas rtag tu rnam rtog dra gcod pa'i// sems ni nag po'i las su mi 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pas khaM las byung ba yi// snying gar sna tshogs
38a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yis bkod pa// khaM las byung ba'i ral gri de nyid ste// sa bon 'di las byung ba'i don yod grub/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi// gong gi go rim nyid bzhin thams cad bya// myur du dbang bskur bas
38a2(rgyud 'grel): sa kun dang // 'gro ba rang bzhin gyis ni dag par lta// phyi rol khrus la'ang cho ga 'dis bya'o// gang zhig thun mtshams nyams par gyur pa yis// des kyang cho ga 'di ni bya ba ste// ji lta ba bzhin nyes pa gsum 'byung gsungs
38a3(rgyud 'grel): gang yang sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus gnas pa'i// hUM las byung ba yi ni bgegs mthar byed// bdud rtsi zhes bya 'khor lo dbang bskur bas// 'bad pas bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom bya ste// de ltar ting 'dzin
38a4(rgyud 'grel): gsum po bsgom bdag nyid// gang bsgoms pas ni shin tu skyo gyur nas// 'khor lo rang snying nang bzhugs rnam par bsam// rnal 'byor ldan pas rig mar ldan par nyal// rnal 'byor gnyid log ldang
38a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su ni// lha mo'i tshogs kyis blangs pa'i glu yis sgraso// myur ba'i kun tu langs nas yang byas te// sngar bshad pa yi mnyam par bzhag par bya// dngos grub mtshan ma nye bar brtags nas ni//
38a6(rgyud 'grel): khang bzang ngos gnyis nas ni 'dzeg pa dang // dge ba'i gtsug lag khang dang sangs rgyas sku// rmi lam nu ma gzhan dang rgyal po mthong // de nyid gsum gyi cho ga bzhin mchod nas// dngos
38b1(rgyud 'grel): grub 'dod pa yis ni dkyil 'khor bya// rig pa 'dzin dang ri lu mig sman dang // bcud kyis len pa 'am phyag rgya che la sogs// rta dang gser dang rin chen sa bzhi 'gro// khrag dang bu dang bu mo du
38b2(rgyud 'grel): ma byin// bskal pa grangs med gsum la sogs pa yis// 'di ru la las sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur// gang yang bde ba chen pa'i ting 'dzin// thams cad bsgoms pas bde bar nyer bsgoms nas// de steng sdig pa kun/
38b3(rgyud 'grel): las rnam grol nas// skad cig gis te rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// bdag gis man ngagra brtsams 'di rab dad pas// bla ma'i zhal gyi pad+ma las rnyed de// mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di la brtag mo dgyes// 'gro ba kun la phan phyir bdag gis byas//
38b4(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar log pa'i rdzun gyis byas pa yis// pha yi drung nas cung zad rnyed pa ltar// de bzhin bdag gis bsod nams cung zad rnyed// de nas 'jig rten 'jam pa'i rdo rjer shog/ dpal ldan u rgyan yul du bstan skyes shing // dpag med rgyud don ma lus
38b5(rgyud 'grel): rab mkhyen pa// dpal ldan rnam par dul zhi'i zhal snga nas// de yos dbang bskur slob ma'i gtso bo mchog/ de las sin+d+hu d+his de skyes shing // rnam thos bsti gan+da zhes bshad rgyal bzhu Ta nas// shAkya'i ba shwe gnyen bdag nyid sa byas shing // de yis yongs bkrol
38b6(rgyud 'grel): zhal gyi man ngag go// dpa ldan skyon yus nA byung ba yi// sangs rgyas yis zhabs kyi zhal snga nas kyi sgrub thabs man ngag go rdzogaso// // lo ts+tsha ba dge slong khyung wang rin chen bzang pos bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
39a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal gsang ba 'dun pa'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas yis kyis mdzad pa'o//
39b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ kun+da bzang po zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan mi shes kun spangs dri med gzi brjid ldan//
39b2(rgyud 'grel): dpag med rigs kyi sprul pa rnams kyis rab brgyan cing // shes rab yan lag 'dus pas 'bar zhing rnam mdzes pa// 'jam dpal gang de mchod phyir de la phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i gzhung lugs bshes gnyen ni// dam pa yi
39b3(rgyud 'grel): ni bskul phyir sgro byas te// 'gro ba ma lus don ni phun tshogs pa'i// rgyur gyur cho ga bdag gis bshad par bya// dal 'byor 'di ni shin tu g.yo ba dang // 'jig rten skye bo dam pa phrad rnyed dka'// de bas shes rab thabs la gzhol ba
39b4(rgyud 'grel): yi/ yid la byed pa'i mchog de bsgrub par bya// de la sngags pa snying rje'o stobs kyis ni// byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed pa dang // gtong ba la sogs yon tan rnams kyis brgyan// zab mo'i tshul dag la ni lhag par mos// dpal ldan
39b5(rgyud 'grel): 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor cho ga yis// rang gi dbang bskur phun sum tshigs ldan zhing // cho ga bzhin du rjes gnang thob pa yi// blo dang ldan pas rang sngags mnyes par bya// la la dri med chu ni phun tshogs shing // shing mchog mdzes pas
39b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam par brgyan pa yi// ri bo'i phyogs gcig tu ni bcom ldan 'das// 'jam dbyangs zhes bya de ltar rab bsgrub bya// dang por nang par snying ga'i zla dbus su// dri med 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba'i me// de nyid ces bya rnams bkod brtse
40a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas// sgo la sogs pa yang dag dag par bya// tsan ngan bzang po la sogs kyis byugs shing // dri zhim me tog gcal bkram mchog gi cha// bsam gtan gnas su bde ba'i stan la ni// gnas nas dus gsum
40a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dmigs te sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin rnams ni// dang por spro sogs blo ldan gyis bya zhing // dge ba rnams ni 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir// sdig pa dag ni bshags pa la sogs bya// gang zhig thog med srid pa'i
40a3(rgyud 'grel): chuklung du// ma lus kun rtog gis bsags rnyog pa rnams// thugs rje cho ldan spyan sngar de dag ni// cho ga bzhin du thams cad bshags par bgyi// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'phags pa gzhan gyis dge ba gang mdzad
40a4(rgyud 'grel): go/ de dag kun la yang dag yi rang zhing // byang chub tu ni yongasu bsngo bar bgyi// yid kyi rol pa dri med zla 'dras bsgrub// snying rje dam pa mtha' yas pa yi thabs// rang gi yid la gnas par gyur pa yi// bde gshegs rnams la rtag tu skyabs
40a5(rgyud 'grel): su mchi// rtog pa ma lus pa las nges grol zhing // sems dpa' dam pa kun gyi phun tshogs gzhi// dngos po thams cad ro gcig ngo bo nyid// dam pa'i chos la rtag par skya ba su mchi// 'ching ba rnams las yang dag grol gyur cig/ snying rje
40a6(rgyud 'grel): mchog gis bskrun pa'i dpal dang ldan// rab tu dga' sogs sa la rab zhugs pa// brtul zhugs dbang po'i tshogs la skyabasu mchi// bsam dang rnam par smin po dag gyur pas// sgrib pa kun gyi bag chag yang dag 'byin// lhag
40b1(rgyud 'grel): par mos pas rnam par brgyan pa yi// sems ni byang chub dam pa bskyed par bgyi// bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyi lam gcig pu// sbyin sogs rnam bcu dkar po'i yon tan tshul// rdzogs sangs rgyas dag ma lus ngo bo'i blos// /
40b2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag nyid du da ni gnas par bgyi// snying rjes 'jig rten 'di ni mo lus pa// lta ba'i dra bas bcings la dmigs nas ni// yang dag byang chub sems ni mnyam med pa// sngags pas cho gas de ltar bsgom par bya// ngo bo nyid dang bral
40b3(rgyud 'grel): phyir stong pa ste// rang bzhin rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med// rtog pa rnams dang bral phyir dngos po ni// mu lus smyon pa las ni nges par grol// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he// de 'og hUM gis rdo rjer byas pa'i sar// kun
40b4(rgyud 'grel): tu bzang las byung bar bsam pa ni// ston ka'i zla ba lta bur rab dkar ba// mtha' yas phyogs gnas sna tshogs 'od dang ldan// gru gsum gyen du gnas pa'i nang gi nI// na mkha' rang gi ngo bo rdo rje 'dzin// chos 'byung zhes bya phyag rgya'i
40b5(rgyud 'grel): dbus gnas pa// pad+ma sna tshogs rdo rje mdzes pa der// bruM gyi 'khor lo las byung rig bcas pa'i// rnam snang mdzad yan lag las yang dag byung // thub dbang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// zer gyis phyogs tshogs mo lus kun/
40b6(rgyud 'grel): tu khyab// mi mnyam pa dag med phyir zur bzhi mnyam// dran dang dbang po'i mchog gi sgo rnams yin// bsam gtan bzhi po dag gi rta babs dang // ting 'dzin kha khyer gyis ni kun tu bskor// kha khyer de la brten pa'i mchod pa ni//
41a1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa 'dzin pa gzungs kyi tshogs rnams yin// sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam spras pa// gang phyir 'gro ba'i bsam kun rdzogs mdzad pa'i// rlung gis bskyod pa'i ba dan phreng ba dang // dril bu sgra sgrogs phyogs sgo kun
41a2(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa// gang phyir dam chos gsung rab yan lag dgu/ gdul bya thams cad la ni bskyod pa po// me long 'dra ba dra phyed me tog gi/ phreng ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan mnyam pa med// ye shes me long dri med byang chub kyi// yan lag dri ni me tog phun su
41a3(rgyud 'grel): tshogs// kab bzang po brgyad kyis nyer mdzes pa// rnam thar brgyad po rnam par dag pa yin// rdo rje'i thig dang yang dag ldan pa ni// rdo rje theg chos 'khor lo rab bskor ba'o// bla med mtha' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// gzugs sogs yul rnams
41a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam par dag pa yin// mchod pa lnga yis rnam par brgyan pa ni// chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rgyu mthun yin// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab mar legs gnas pa'i// nyi zla mgon bcas lha yi gnas rnams dang // rin chen ma lus pa yis rnam spras pa
41a5(rgyud 'grel): gzhal yas khang pa dar ni bsam par bya// bcu drug cha dang tshogs las byung ba yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dag ni dbus nyid du// 'od zer dpag tu med pa'i tshogs ldan pa// dbus pa'i gdan la cho ga bzhin du bsam// dpal mchog dang po'i
41a6(rgyud 'grel): snying po las byung ba'i// rdo rje bzang 'dir nor bu dmar 'dral// dpag med thub pa'i 'od tshogs rnams 'phro ba// phyogs sgo mtha' yas khyad par rab bsgrub pa// dang po'i snying po mchog bcas bsgoms nas ni// nga rgyal de ltar mtha' yas sprul pa/
41b1(rgyud 'grel): yis// 'gro ba mchog gi don rnams byas gyur cing // thub mchog phra rab las bsgrubs mtshungs med pa// zla ba brgyad 'drar dkar ba'i mdangs ldan zhing // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dmar// sna tshog rgyan rnams 'bar ba'i phyag gnyis
41b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis// rig ma dam par 'khyud par mdzad pa'o// lhag ma'i phyag gis rdo rje ral gri dang // pad+ma rin chen bsnams pas zung gnyis mdzes// khams gsum khong ni rnam par brgyan pa yis// thub pa'i 'od tshogs du ma rnam par 'gyeng // rnam par
41b3(rgyud 'grel): thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam dag pas// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid snying rje mchog/ ma lus 'gro ba'i de nyid gcig pu nyid// rgyal ba skyed byed nyid kyi sku ru bsam// mchog tu rjes chags phun tshogs dpag med kyis// 'dul ba'i 'jig
41b4(rgyud 'grel): rten thams cad dmigs nas ni// dga' ba'i sgyu ma'i sgra yis de rnams dang // rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams ma lus gzhug par bya// de ni spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo dang // gzugs sogs ma lus yul gyi rang bzhin du// phyung nas
41b5(rgyud 'grel): rigs ma de dag thams cad ni// rang gi rig mo'i nang du chud par bya// de yi pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang du ni// dkyil 'khor dri maud zla zer las byung bar// bsams nas blo yis 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams ni// ma lus de ni rab tu gzhug par bya//
41b6(rgyud 'grel): gsang ba'i rdo rje dam pa'i dbus su ni// rnam snang la sogs rgyal ba'i tshogs gzhug ste// zla ba zhu ba'i gzugasu gyur pa dang // des ni de rnams de 'og dbang bskur bya// sa yi snying po phyag na rdo rje dang // mkha' snying 'jig rten dbang phyug
42a1(rgyud 'grel): sgrib sel bcas// dpal ldan kun tu bzang po zhes bya bas// de dag mig la sogs pa grangs bzhin no// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dag dang // reg bya dang ni chos dbyings rdo rje dang // sa dang chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi// ngo bo nyid gyur
42a2(rgyud 'grel): spyan la sogs par grags// gzugs dang tshor ba de bzhin 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam par shes bshad pa// rnam par snang mdzad la sogs bde gshegs te// de rjes sa bon gyis ni dbyung bar bya// k+ShiM dzaM khaM gaM Sh+kaM saM zhes bshad pa// 'di
42a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag mig la sogs pa rnams kyi mig/ dza hUM baM ho khaM raM zhes bshad pa// de dag gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs pa// lAM baM baM taM zhes bya bzhir bshad pa// de dag spyan la sogs pa rnams kyi yin// bru~M AM dz+r-IM khaM hUM zhes bya ba 'di// rim pa ji bzhin
42a4(rgyud 'grel): brtag pa la sogs pa'i'o// oM AHhUM zhes bya ba'i sems nyid ni// 'od ldan ho dang spel ba tshe ga bzhin// pad+ma'i nang du zhugs pa mnyam med pa// shes rab chags pas zhu bar bya b.rarwa bsam// de yi 'od kyi mthu yis gnyis ka yang //
42a5(rgyud 'grel): zla ba zhu bar byas par mthong ba dang // spyan la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis ni// glu yi sgra yis bskul bar byas par bsam// sems can khams na gnas kyi dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba yid 'ong don chen 'dod pas bdag
42a6(rgyud 'grel): li skyabs tu gsol// mgon po gal te de ring bdag gis gson par mchi bzhad ni// sems can yab chen mnyen mchog bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje'i sku khyed bka' yi 'khor lo sems can kun la ben// sangs rgyas don
42b1(rgyud 'grel): du byang chub don dam rab tu phan par gzigs// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan zhing thugs brtse ba//
42b2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dag gi don dang dgos pa mdzad la rab tu brtson// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// dga' ba'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyod ni rdo rje 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi
42b3(rgyud 'grel): phan ngon che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam nyid thugs brtse ba// mgon po gal te de ring bdag ni gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de lta'i glu yi ngo
42b4(rgyud 'grel): ru byas pas na// chos kun sgyu ma lta bur yang dag rig/ snang ba'i 'od zer gyi ni dkyil 'khor can// rang gi sngags kyi lus su rang nyid gyur// de yi 'od zer ma lus pa rnams kyis// rang lha dang mtshungs sprul pa'i thub dbang pos// dpag tu//
42b5(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i yid kyis bcug pa las// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje zhes byar gyur// gur gum bzang po'i mdog ltar dmar ba la// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni sngo dang dkar// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan pa yi// phyag
42b6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis shes rab dam pa 'khyud pa dang // mdangs ldan ral gri dang ni mda' nyid dang // ut+pal sngon gzhu mtha' yas 'od ldan bsnams// ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas rnam brgyan cing // skyob pa na mkha' ma lus dkyil 'khor yin//
43a1(rgyud 'grel): dngos rnams thams cad gzung dang 'dzin pa dang // bral bas dngos po med pa nyid du shes// rnam par byang la mngon par zhen pa ni// med pas byin gyis brlabs pa 'di nyid bya// oM d+har+m+ma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ti// de 'og rang sgyings
43a2(rgyud 'grel): bon 'od rnams kyis// rang gi mig sogs sa snying la sogs pas// ji bzhin bkang nas dri med rab zla yis// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus gnas yi ge hUM// thugs kyi rdo rje'i de bzhin kha dang ni// mgo bor pad+mo 'khor lo la gnas pa'i// a dang oM ni
43a3(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi rdo rje dang // sku yi rdo rje nyid du bsam par bya// de yi thugs kha'i 'od kyi tshogs rnams dang // shes rab dam par gnas pa'i 'od rnams kyis// kun nas rgyal ba'i dbang po mchod nas ni// thugs kyi rdo rje la sogs byin gyis brlab// dpal
43a4(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyi
43a5(rgyud 'grel): brlab nas su// rdo rje thugs kyis mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+rA swa b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ chos kyi gsung lam dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed po gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje gsungs gos
43a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// dang bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje gsung gis mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dpal
43b1(rgyud 'grel): ldan rdo rje sku 'chang gA/ rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// deng bdag byin gyis brlab nas su// rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pa// deng bdag byin gyis brla
43b2(rgyud 'grel): nus su// rdo rje skus ni mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA gA tA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ nu mkha' lta bur ngo bor rdo rje gsum// mtshan nyid dag dang bral bar dmyigs nas ni// phyogs bcur kun bzhugs pa yi thub pa'i tshogs// snying po'i la
43b3(rgyud 'grel): zer rnams kyis yang dag bskul// thub pa'i mchog gi 'od zer la byung ba'i// rigs pa'i tshogs rnams phyag na bum pa bsnams te// ye shes chu yis mngon par dbang bskur bas// rang gi rigs kyi gtsos brgyan cod pan gyur// de bzhin
43b4(rgyud 'grel): rang gi lha 'dra rang snying pos// sprul pa'i rig pa nyid ni yang dag lta// mig la sogs pa dgang zhing yi ge gsum// rnam par bkod pas lus ni 'od dang ldan// de nyid shes pas mgo dang snying ga dang // lte ba gsang ba de bzhin brla gnyis /
43b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs// oM hUM swA AHhA zhes grags pa rnams// de ni sku thugs rdo rje bzang rigs sogs// lnga po rnams kyis yan lag byin brlabs te// 'od kyi phreng ba dam pas 'gro gsum khyab// a yis sna tshogs pad+ma'i lte bu bya// hUM gis 'dab
43b6(rgyud 'grel): ma brgyad pa rnam par sprul// shes rab dam pa'i rgyu mthun ngo bo nyid// thabs dang bcas par 'byung ba'i rang gi lus// de yis bde gshegs rjes su mnyes byas zhes// sngags pas dga' ba kun tu brtsam par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a
44a1(rgyud 'grel): nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ thugs ka'i zla ba'i sngags kyi 'od rnams kyis// ma lus sangs rgyas tshogs rnams bcug nas ni// hUM gi rdo rje las byung dri ma med pa yi// yid tshul dam pa'i tshul skyes la gnas pa//
44a2(rgyud 'grel): rang gi snying po las byung ma lus pa'i// rang gi dkyil 'khor pa yi gzugs bsams la// cho ga 'di yis sems ni brtan po dang // 'jig rten rnams la phan phyir yang dag dbyung // badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya dang thugs rdo rje// skye bo dam pa'i don maH
44a3(rgyud 'grel): yang dag bskul// nor bu sngon po'i 'od 'drar yang dag 'bar// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal ni dkar dang dmar// dam pa dang po lta bu'i phyag dang ldan// kha dog dpag tu med pa'i 'od tshogs mnga'// blo dang ldan pas legs bsdus bdag
44a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi// dngos po thams cad kyis ni zhugs par bya// dzi na dzi ka ces bya ba sku rdo rje// rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i sku mdog zhal gyis mdzes// 'khor lo la sogs phyag mtshan rnams de bzhin// shar gyi pad+mar zla ba'i dbus su bsam// rit+na d+h+r-ika
44a5(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba 'di yis ni// nor bu rin chen 'byung zhal gzhon nu 'dra// btso mo'i gser gyi mdangs dang 'dra ba la// phyag drug margad rin chen la sogs bsnams// A ro li ka 'od dpag med pad+ma ni// rA ga ltar dmar zhal gnyis de dang 'dra//
44a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer 'bar zhing phyag na pad+ma sogs// mtshan ma bsnams pa nub tu bsam par bya// pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika ces bya dang don yod grub// rin chen margad lta bu'i mdog ldan zhing // snga ma lta bu'i zhal sogs phun sum tshogs mnga' ba// ral gri la so/
44b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa byang du bsam// ral bcod pan mdzes dang sna tshogs pa'i// rin chen mchog gi 'od zer 'bar bas brgyan// rig pa mgon dang rab tu bcas pa'i sku// thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la bsam// mo ha ra ti zhes pas lha mo spyan// zla ba
44b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la gnas pa// mchog tu sred cing sku yi rdo rje 'dra// me yi phyogs nyid du ni bsam par bya// dwe la ra ti zhes pa dga' ba che// dga' chen mchog 'dod mA ma ki zhes pa// zhal mdzes phyag rnams thugs kyi gtso 'dra/
44b3(rgyud 'grel): ba// rnam par sgeg pa bden bral mtshamasu bsam// rA ga ts+tshi zhes bya yum mchog ni// gos dkar yon tan rin chen mtha' yas pa// dri med sku ni gsung gi dbang phyug 'dra// rlung gi phyogasu rnam par bsam par bya// badz+ra ra tis rab bsku
44b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrol ma ni// dri med rin chen 'od kyi phreng ba yis// phyogs kyi tshogs khebs rang gi ngo bo ni// rin chen dbang 'dra dbang ldan phyogasu bsam// lha mo 'di rnams nges pa'i phyag mtshan ni// 'khor lo bzang dang ut+pal dmar pa dang //
44b5(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma ut+pal gser mdog rim bzhin bsam// lhag ma rnams ni bdag po ji bzhin 'dong // de nyid gsum gyis gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// lha mo rnam ni sku la so/ dra bA kyai rdzi ni mtshams gyur bzhi po dang // rtsa ba'i sgo yi ngos gnyis dag
44b6(rgyud 'grel): tu bsam// ya mAn+ta kr-ita ces byas gshin rje gshed// mtha' yas 'jigs 'od phyogs kun khyab dang ldan// dus mtha' mi zad sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mdog/ thugs kyi rgyal po dag dang sku mtshungs pa// drag po'i rigs 'od dpag med
45a1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ya/ rnams 'bru sa// gshin rje mthang mdzad shin tu 'dug pa yi// sbrul khyim lus kyi yan lag rnam brgyan pa// dpal ldan shar gyi skyon bsam par bya// brardzun pata ces byas bla med 'ong // drag tsang phyag sogs su
45a2(rgyud 'grel): yi rdo rje 'dra// gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya gtum po ni// lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru bsam par bya// pad+man+ta kr-ita ces byas phyogs rnams kyis// 'khor los 'od kyis mngon par khebs byed pa// 'od mdangs 'jig dus med 'drar 'jigs
45a3(rgyud 'grel): par ldan// phyag la sogs par gsung gi rdo rje 'dra// dug pa du ma rnams gnon 'jigs pa'i zhal// thub dbang ha ha zhes ni bzhad pa yi// ri bor bcas pa skyel bas skrag mdzad pa// rta mgrin de bzhin nub kyi phyogasu bsam//
45a4(rgyud 'grel): big+h+nAM ta kr-ita ces byas dpa' bo ni// dus mtha'i me ltar drag po bdud rtsi 'khyil// 'phags pa'i zhabs sogs mi bskyod dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin byang gi sgo ru bsam par bya// rnam par snang mdzad thugs gtso 'od dpag med// thugs
45a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbang po rim bzhin cod pan yin// tho bar dbyug pa de bzhin pad+ma dang // rdo rje sogs 'di phyag ni kun la bsam// de ltar yongasu rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dngos po thams cad kyis ni bltas nas kyang // snying po'i sngags kyi
45a6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer lcags kyu yi// drangs nas bde bar gshegs rnams bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin dri med pa'o// ting 'dzin las byung dam pa'i bdes gang bar// 'khor lo bsams nas de nas gshin rje ni// mthar byed
45b1(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bshad pas bsrung bar bya// rang gi snying pos mngon bzlas mchod yon ni// tsan ngan bzung sobs me tog gis mdzes dbul// rang las byas pa lta bur dbang bskur zhing // cho ga yis ni mngon par mchod par bya// pad nang rang gi
45b2(rgyud 'grel): sa bon 'di rnams kyis// gzugs la sogs pa thams cad drangs nas ni// yang dag byang chub yid kyi ngo bo yi// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dag tu bsgom par bya// shes rab pa spu re las byung ba yi// 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs//
45b3(rgyud 'grel): ma lus na mkha'i gtos ni kun tu khyab// de la blo dang ldan pas rab tu spro// 'od kyi la sgo las nges par byung ba yi// yan lag dri med rgyan kun gyis legs brgyan// me long pi wang dri dang ro yi snod // gos dang chos 'byung ba la
45b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yi// mtshan mas rim gyis rnam par sgeg bcas shing // rol pa'i lag pa dam pa rnams dang ni// 'od kyi snang bas sprul pa sna tshogs pa'i// mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra bas khyab pa dang // dngos rnams sgyu ma la sogs so/
45b5(rgyud 'grel): sor ni// yang dag rig cing 'jig rten lta mkhas pa// rtog pa ma lus kun las nges grol zhing // mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa// gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams dang ni// de bzhin phyi yi dri sogs thams cad kyis// /
45b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams ni legs mchod cing // de ltar tha dad rtog la nges grol bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ke ha~M/ sgra yi yul rnams ma lus pa rnams ni// brag ca'i sgra 'drar nges brtag der rjes la// yang yid
46a1(rgyud 'grel): ldag pa'i lha ru gnas pa la// chos rnams bstod pa'i sgra ni byed par bsam// mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkha' chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// rnam
46a2(rgyud 'grel): bar snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po/ rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshalo// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri med mkha'// rang bzhin dag pa gos pa med// rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshalo//
46a3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che// mi rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje'i gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rang bzhin dag pa nyid las
46a4(rgyud 'grel): byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tsha lo// 'bar ba'i rlung gis byin brlabs rlung dang me'i// dkyil 'khor la gnas rab sbar bdud rtsi lnga// de nas yi gi gsum bzlas dpag med pa'i// thub pa'i dbang po'i rlung du chud par bya// ye shes
46a5(rgyud 'grel): bdud rtsi'i ngo bor bsams nas ni// hUM dgod rdo rje'i lce ni bzang po dang // snying ga'i zla ba'i dbus su ma lus pa'i// rgyal ba'i 'khor lho des ni tshim par bya// snying po'i 'od zer dpag med kyis sprul pa'i// thub pas mi shes kun
46a6(rgyud 'grel): tu nges gsal nas// 'gro ba ma lus rdzogs sangs rgyas byas te// rang gi gsang sngags nang du chud par bya// gzugs la sogs pa'i rnams pa dang bral bas// 'dzin pa de ni mngon sum mthong mi nus// gzung ba rnams kyang cung
46b1(rgyud 'grel): zad yong min la// gzhan pa'i 'brel pa yis kyang mthong ba med// bde sogs de ni yongasu 'dzin pa ni// bya ba 'ga' yang yod par ma mthong ste// cig car shes pa'i phyir na gzugs sogs bzhin// 'di dag 'dzin pa por ni yod ma yin// dkar po
46b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs gang zhig mthong ba rnams// de nyid dus gzhan dag tu mthong mi 'gyur// 'di nyid rtag tu gcig la gcig 'gal ba// yin phyir bde ba la sogs ngag dang mtshungs// thog mtha' la sogs bye brag snang bas na// gzugs la sogs/
46b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di dag gcig ma yin// phra rab rnams kyang mthong ba ma yin pas// du ma'i gzugasu min pa'ang de dang 'dra// rdul phran cha shas med pa nyid kyang ni// phra rab du ma 'dus pa yod min pas// sa yi dkyil 'khor la sogs rang bzhin /
46b4(rgyud 'grel): te// bsags pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni med par 'gyur// de bas 'dzin po la sogs dang bral bas// rang rgyud gzugs sogs brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid// rgyu dang mi rgyu dngos po ma lus pa// dri za'i grong khyer dag dang mtshungs pa yin// bdag
46b5(rgyud 'grel): dang bdag gi rnam rtog rgyun gyi ni// ngo bo dag gis der ni 'khor ba ste// drag pa phyin ci log de med pa yi// ngo bo tsam gyis rnam par shes par bya// 'dir ni zhi dang srid pa'i ngo bo dag/ chos nyid kyis ni dbye ba 'ga' yang med// gang phyir gzung/
46b6(rgyud 'grel): ba la sogs rnam pa dang // bral bar thams cad du ni rtag tu grub// de ni snang ba'i rang bzhin kun rtog las// thams cad ci yang yod pa ma yin te// sems las gzhan pa dag ces bya ba ni// yod pa ma yin de phyir de bdag nyid// gang
47a1(rgyud 'grel): zhig gzugs la sa sor thugs gyur ba// de'i bdag nying gang yin de nyid gzugs// de bas thams cad khyab par med par brtag/ snang bar gyur pa'i yul rnams gang yin pa/ gang zhig rtog pa'i gnasu gyur pa rnams/
47a2(rgyud 'grel): de de gnyis sbyor ba dang bral bas// des na rnam par dbye ba thams cad min// dang dang brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa dang // de bzhin dran dang bsam gtan rnam dge pa'ang // sgo bzang srung bar byed pa'i ngo bo nyid// shes rab rnam dag ma lus yul du
47a3(rgyud 'grel): sna mtshan ma med pa'i dga' ba rnam dag pa// ma lus lha mo'i tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid// sems can don dang bdag dang rnam rtog dang // 'jug pa'i rnam shes rnam par dag pa yang // me long sogs yid dri med ngo bo bas// sangs rgyas tham
47a4(rgyud 'grel): cid kyi yang rang bzhin te// de bzhin nyid ni rnam dag sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo'i gtso bo 'di ni rnam par bzhugs// gzugs la sogs pa'i 'khrul pa rnam bral bas// dri med phung po la sogs ngo bor grub// ser sna la sogs ldog par
47a5(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa ni// pha rol phyin pa dkar po'i chos rang bzhino// rnam rtog med par bdag gzhan don 'byung ba'i// rgyu nyid kyis na de yang go rims bzhin// zab pa dang ni rgya che ba yis na// shes rab thabs kyis bdag nyid can sems yin/
47a6(rgyud 'grel): drim pa'i don du ci yong gzhan dag las// dbye med dbye ba ming min mi 'dod ste// gzhan du 'dzin pa las ni bzlog phyir dang // de bzhin bye brag la sogs tog bral yin// de ltar brtags nas rang snying dri med pa// zla ba la gnas
47b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshan mar bsgom par bya// gsang sngags dam pa thig le'i gzugasu ni// rang yid 'od dang ldan par yongasu bsgom// sems de'i 'od zer dri med pas sad pa'i// sku gsung rdo rje'i lus ni mchog gyur pa'i// slar yang 'di nyid du ni nges
47b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs shing // ye shes bdud rtsi 'beb par bsam par bya// nang gI lus drung de bzhin thams cad kyang // de yis kun tu mthar ni snang byas nas// ba spu re re'i khongs las byung ba yi// tshogs kyis sna tshogs kun tu dgang bar bya// yang
47b3(rgyud 'grel): na rang gi mtshan ma phra mo ni// 'od ldan sna rtser gnas par thub pa yi// 'khor nang du chud byas snying rje yis// nang gi shes rab dam pa nyin mtshan bsgom// mtshan ma brtan po mthong na spro ba ni// 'od zer de yis sprul pa'i thub dbang dang /
47b4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs pa yi phyag mtshan rnams// blo dang ldan pas yang dang yang du spro// yang na bzlas la rtse gcig sems nyid ni// dngos kun bdag nyid rang gi sems dbang po// rang gi sngags ni sna tshogs 'od ldan par// byas pas blo
47b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pas bsgom par bya// srog drang rtsolnga ba shin tu ma bsdams par// gsang sngags rgyal po gsal bar brjod bya zhing // sku sogs rim pa bzhin du yang na ni// cig car spro ba dag ni legs par bya// nam mkha' gtos
47b6(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam pa sku sogs pa'o// 'od kyi sku yi snang bas yang dge dgang // de nas snga ma bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// mchod pa'i sprin gyis bkod pa kun tu spro// yongasu sbas pa'i rig pa mchog rnams ni// bde tshon babs pas gzhan
48a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis dbang thob nas// rnam par sgeg pa'i thub dbang tshogs rnams ni// mthar ni rang gi lus la gzhug par bya// rang gi snying po'i de nyid nges rtogs pa'i// skyo bas sems kyi spyod pa zhum gyur na// rig pa'i tshogs kyis
48a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag glur blangs pas// rab tu bskul nas yongasu mchod par bya// sems bzang po yi chu rgyun srog dang ni// stsol ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyus drangs nas ni// cho ga ji bzhin sku rdo rje sogs la// nges par dbang bas skyo ba bsal bar bya// de ltar
48a3(rgyud 'grel): thangs cig ngal gso byas nas ni// sngar bshad cho ga yi ni de nyid shes// gsang sngags dam pa rgyun tu bzla ba ni// sngags pa'ang kun tu chags pa med par bya// bstod dang mchod sogs gshegasu gsol ba dang // sngags pas rab tu 'bad
48a4(rgyud 'grel): de rnams bya zhing // oM la sogs par 'khor lo bsdus nas ni// sku la sogs pa brtag pa dag tu bya// de ltar de nyid mthong bas rnam grol ba// sems can khams rnams kun tu dmigs nas ni// snying rjes 'gro ba rnams la phan
48a5(rgyud 'grel): don du// smon lam rnams ni mngon sum nyid du bya// langs nas dag pa'i sems dpa' rang gi lha'i// rnam pa'i nga rgyal yid la byas nas ni// kun tu snang bar gnas pa'i yul rnams ni// snga ma bzhin du yul du yongasu bsgom// rang
48a6(rgyud 'grel): rang gi ni ngo bo rnams dag pa// rim bzhin sku la sogs pa'i rdo rjer gyur// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur ni// chos nyid kyis na phan tshun khyad par med// phyin ci log pa rtog pa spangs pa yis// bya ba ma lus pa ni rdzogs par bya//
48b1(rgyud 'grel): de yi thub pa'i 'khor lo ma lus pa// mchod pa 'di ni kun tu mchog yin no// bza' za'i tshe na snying ga'i zla ba la// 'khor lo'i gtso bo rang gi gsang sngags kyis// kun tu dmigs te byang chub sems kyi ni// ngo bo nyid gyur 'od dang
48b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan par bsam// rang gi zas la de nyid gsum bzlas te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam dag pa// de yis sku yis rdo rje la sogs pa// lha rnams kun tu tshim pa nyid du bya// phyi yi sbyin sreg cho gas bsgre bya zhing // yid kyi
48b3(rgyud 'grel): 'ang yid nyid kyis ni bya ba ste// phung po'i bud shing rnam par bsreg pa yi// ye shes 'bar ba bla na med par bshad// de ltar ma lus pa yi 'dod pa yis// bdag nyid dam ni gzhan dag rang rang gi/ lha yi gzugs gyur pa la yang
48b4(rgyud 'grel): dag mchod// dam tshig 'di ni bde gshegs rnams kyis gnang // rjes su mthun pa'i 'gro ba'i don rnams ni// ma lus bde gshegs mchod par yang dag brtag/ lus la sogs pa'i las rnams de dang de// rtag tu legs par mnya
48b5(rgyud 'grel): par bzhag ste bya// rnam pa de 'dra'i sems ldan lus dang ni// ngag yid las rnams ci yang rung ba dag/ phyag rgya dang ni sngags kyi rnam pa ru// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis de gsungs// gang phyir dngos po gcig la'ang sna tsho
48b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i kun tu rtog pas bsags pa'i rnam pa las// sdug bsngal bde dang grol ba skyed byed pa'i// las kyi khyad par mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// de bas las sogs dge dang mi dge ba'i// rnam pa'i las rnams sems kyi dbang lnga
49a1(rgyud 'grel): gsungs// de ltar rnyog pa ma lus spangs pa yi// sems ni nag po'i las su ga la 'gyur// dam tshig nyams la snying ga'i zla bar ni// snying pos sna tshogs rdo rje ci bzhin bsam// dpal ldan dam tshig rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gro
49a2(rgyud 'grel): ba rang bzhin gyis dag rnam bsams la// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma dbus su ni// sngar gyi rim pas dbang bskur kun tu blang // phyi rol gyi yang khrus kyi cho ga la// rim 'di khyad par du yang bsam par bya// thun mtsham su yang de bzhin mchod la soT
49a3(rgyud 'grel): sngon du 'gro ba'i bzlas brjod byas nas ni// snying ga'i nang du 'khor lo chung byas la// snying rje dang ni shes rab ldan par nyal// ldang ba'i dus su dam tshig lha mo yi// yang dag glu yis dpal ldan bskul bas ni// langs na thub pas bzlas brjod la
49a4(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa// cho ga snga ma bzhin du bya ba yin// dngos grub thob pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas ni// de nyid gsum mchod byas nas rang gi sems// sngar bshad dkyil 'khor dgra la gnas nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu bsgrub par bya// bgegs
49a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams bdud rtsi thab sbyor 'khor lo yis// dbang bskur byas nas 'bad pa med par 'joms// gang zhig dbus su gnas par gyur pa yi// 'khor lo de yang de yi yin par 'gyur// tha mal rnam rtog rgyun las gzhan pa yi// srid pa'i sdug
49a6(rgyud 'grel): bsngal gzhan ci'ang yod ma yin// de dang rnam par 'gal bar 'gyur ba'i sems// 'di ni mngon sum du ni rtogs par 'gyur// zab cing rgya che ba yi bdag nyid can// gang yin der ni kun rtog snang mi 'gyur// rig pa las ni gzhan du
49b1(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa dag/ yod pa min par sngar ni bsgrubs pas na// gang zhig gang dang mi mthun pa dag tu// lan cig gyur pa'ang de bgrod rgyus gyur pa// mthong ba'i bslabs pa rnam par 'phel ba yis// rang gi mi mthun shin tu 'gag par byed// sbyin pa la sogs
49b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag med ldan pas kyang // tha mal pA yi rang gi ngo bo las// rnam par ldog par mi 'gyur gang phyir 'dir// yod kyang de ni mi mthun 'gyur ma yin// de ltar rtogs na snying rjer ldan pa dag/ ye shes bsam yas skad cig gis sgrub pa// dpal ldan
49b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bzang po'i rang gi ni// ngo bo su zhig nges par bsgom mi byed// dri med blo yi 'od zer rnams kyis ni// mun pa thams cad rnam par sel byed pa// rnam par bstan pas mdzad pa 'dis mchog gi/ bdag 'dra'i go skabs dag ni ga la yod//
49b4(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pa'i gzhung ni cung zad tsam// gzung ba gang yin de yang dang por ni// 'ching ba lhod ces bya bar grags pas na// des na 'di la shin tu 'bad pa yin// de ltar rnam par sbyar la legs byung ba'i// dge ba dri med gang des 'gro ba'i yid/
49b5(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas ye shes mgon dang bcas pa der// gzhol bar gyur pas rtag tu bsgom par shog/ dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze'u
49b6(rgyud 'grel): 'bru'i rdul la reg pa/ slob dpon chen po sangs rgyas ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogaso// // rgya gar mkhan po a tsar+ya shrad+d+ha ka ra warma dang / zhu chen lo tsa ba rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
50a1(rgyud 'grel): yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang po dang te ru ka'i sgrub thabs bzhug so// / rgya gar skad du/ tsa tu raM ga sA d+ha nAM no pi ka sa man+ta b+ha dra nA ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kun tu bzang mo zhes bya ba// dpa'
50a2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa' lha phyag 'tshalo// dpal ldan 'khrul pa kun bsal dri ma med pa yi// gzi brjid mtha' yas rigs kyi sprul byas rnam brgyan pa// shes rab ma yis lus 'khyud mdzes pas klubs pa gang // 'jam dpal de la de mchod don dngos
50a3(rgyud 'grel): cho ga 'di bshad bya// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i tshul gyis dam pa'i bshes// gnyen gsol btab byed brod pas// 'gro ba'i don kun phun sum tshogs gzhi dngos po cho ga bshad par bya// skabs ldan g.yo ba 'di dang dam skye bo dang 'grogs shin
50a4(rgyud 'grel): tu thob dka' 'jig rten la// de phyir thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin byed 'dod sems ni mchog tu gyur pa yin// de nas snying rje'i mthu las byung ba'i byang chub yid ldan gsang sngags pa// gtong ba la sogs yon tan brgyad pa zab
50a5(rgyud 'grel): mo'i tshul la mos pa 'am// dpal ldan gsang 'dus dkyil 'khor tshogs shin tu dbang bskur phun sum ldan// cho ga bzhin du lung sAl thob pa bzhi sngags bsnyen pa blo ldan pas// gang zhig dri med chu sogs ljon shing mchog gis
50a6(rgyud 'grel): phreng ba klubs pa yi// goms pa'i ri la bcom ldan 'jam dbyangs zhes bya rab tu bsgrub par bya// dang po tho rangs snying ga'i dbusu dri med 'od 'phro de nyid bsam// bkod nas snying rje can gyis sgo la sogs pa yang dag par yang bya// dam pa'i
50b1(rgyud 'grel): tsan ngan sogs dkyus dri zhim me tog bkram pa'i mchog cha la// bas gtan gnas su bde ba'i gnasu 'dug nas dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams// dmigs te sna tshogs mchod sprin spro sogs sngon du byas nas blo ldan pas// sdig pa la sogs 'di
50b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar bya'o dge ba 'phel don du// thog ma med ldan srid pa'i rgyun la rtog pas bsags pa'i sdig kun gang // snying rje chen po'i mdun rim bzhin te thams cad bshags par bgyi// yang dag sangs rgyas byang chub 'phags dang gzhan rnams
50b3(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'i dge ba gang // ma lus bdag gi yi rang yang dag dri ni byang chub phyir bsngo'o// sems rgyas zla ba dri ma med las grub pas mtha' yas snying rje gnas// bdag gi yid la gnas pa'i bde bar gshegs la rtag tu skyabasu mchi// rtog
50b4(rgyud 'grel): pa kun las nges grol ma lus dam pa sems dpa'i bkra shis gzhi// dngos po kun gyi ngo bor chos la bdag nyid skyabasu mchi// bcings pas yang dag spangs pa'i snying rje mchog gis drangs pa'i dpal ldan pa// rab dga' la sogs
50b5(rgyud 'grel): sa la gnas pa dam bcas tshogs la skyab su mchi// bsam pa rnams sbyin dag pas sgrib kun bag chags ma lus bcom pa ste// mos pas rnam par brgyan pa'i sems kyis byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// bde gshegs sras
50b6(rgyud 'grel): bcas lam gcig sbyin sogs bcu po dkar po yon tan ngo bo la// rdzogs sangs rgyas dag kun gyi rang bzhin blo yis de ltar bsten par bgyi// 'jig rten 'di dag lta ba'i dra bas bkab la snying rjes dmigs na su// yang dag byang
51a1(rgyud 'grel): chub sems kyi gzhal med bsgom rim 'di ni bsngags pas bya// stong pa rang bzhin med phyir rgyu 'bras phyir ni rang bzhin mtshan ma med// rjesu dpag pa gsal bas mA lus gzhi yi smon pa des bral lo// oM shUn+ya tA
51a2(rgyud 'grel): dz+nyA nu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de 'og sgron zla dkar po mtha' mdo phyogs 'khor gnas pa sna tshogs 'od // 'phags par gnas pa'i gru gsum nang gi mkha' yi rang bzhin rdo rje 'dzin// chos kyi 'byung zhes phyag rgya dbus gnas pad+ma
51a3(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan// hUM gis rdo rje rgyan pa'i sa la kun tu bzang po las byung bsgom// bruM yig 'khor lo las byung rig ma dang bcas snang mdzad skur gyur pa// gsang ba thub dbang dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'od zer gyis khyab phyogs
51a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor kun// gru bzhis mnyam pa'i phyir na mchog bzhis dran pa dbang po sgo rnams kyis// bsam gtan bzhi'i tA ra Na ting 'dzin mu khyud bzhi yis yongs bskor ba// mu khyud de la gnas pa dam pa'i mchod pas 'brel pa'i gzugs
51a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams rgyun// sna tshogs rgyan rnams bkod pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs phyir// 'dul bas bskyod pa gsung rab yan lag dgu yi dam chos kun 'gro ci yi phyir// rlung gis bskyod pa rgyal mtshan phreng dang dril
51a6(rgyud 'grel): sgras grags pas phyogs sgo kun// me long ye shes rtag tu dri med byang chub yan lag me tog spos bkram zhing // dra ba dra phyed me long me tog phreng ba sna tshogs brgyan pa'i gzugs// rnam par thar brgyad rnam par dag pas
51b1(rgyud 'grel): ka ba brgyad kyis klubs pa'i mchog/ rdo rje tshul gyis chos kyi 'khor los sgyur phyir rdo rje'i thig ldan la// gzugs la sogs pa'i spyod yul dag pas bla med mtha' yas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga// zas lngas brgyan pas rnam par dag pa'i
51b2(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi dbyings rgyu mthun// sna tshogs pad+ma la gnas nyi ma zla bar bcas paM lho yi gdan// ma lus rin chen bkod pa'i gzhal yos brtsegs pa de la bsgom// bcu drug cha shas sde pa las byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ba yi dbus//
51b3(rgyud 'grel): dbus kyi gdan la cho ga bzhin du 'od dpag med bzhi bsam par bya// mchog gi dang po'i snying po las byung rdo rje dam pa ye shes gzugs// grangs med thug po'i 'od zer phreng bas grub pa'i phyogs sgo kun// bsams nas dang po snying
51b4(rgyud 'grel): por bcas pa'i nga rgyal ldan pas sprul pa mtha' yas kyis// 'gro ba'i don mchog rab mdzad pa yi thugs mchog rdul phran rnams bkod gzugs brnyan can// g.yas g.yon zhal ni gnag dang dmar po zla ba rdzogs ltar dkar ba'i
51b5(rgyud 'grel): mdog/ gsal bas rnam par bkod pas brgyan pa'i phyir phyag gnyis dam pa'i rig ma 'khyud// lhag ma'i phyag zung gnyis brgyan rdo rje ral gri rin chen pad+ma 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum khong brgyan pa'i 'od zer rnam pa bde 'gro thub dbang //
51b6(rgyud 'grel): rnam thar gsum dag shes rab bdag nyid snying rje'i mchog gi thabs ldan pas// 'gro kun de nyid gcig pa rgyal ba skyed byed sku bzhi mngon sum bya// mchog tu rjes chags phun sum tshogs pas 'dzin thaMd 'dul dmig nas// dgA bI rdzu 'phru
52a1(rgyud 'grel): sku yis rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams rang gi was nang gzhug/ de ni stan la sogs pa'i lha mo gzugs sogs yul gyi rang bzhin pas// phyung nas rig ma thams cad bzhi yi rig ma'i nang du thim par bya// de yi pad+ma
52a2(rgyud 'grel): snying po'i dbus su dkyil 'khor dri med zla 'od las byung ba// blo yis bsams nas rdzogs par bde la skye bo'i tshogs rnams gzhug par bya// dam pa gsang ba'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnam snang mdzad sogs rgyal ba'i rgyan zhugs nas// zla ba
52a3(rgyud 'grel): zhu ba'i ngo bor gyur pas dbang bskur byas te de 'og tu// sa snying phyag na rdo rje nam snying 'dzag rten dbang phyug sgrib pa sel// dpal ldan kun tu bzang po de dag mig la sogs pa'i grangasu gyur// gzugs sgra dri dang ro dang reg bya chos dbyings
52a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yang // sa chu me rlung rang bzhin gyur pa spyan la sogs pa'i grangasu 'gyuraro// gzugs dang myo ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na 'du byed yid brjod pas// rnam snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs rnams te de 'og sa bon gyis dbyung bya// k+ShiM
52a5(rgyud 'grel): khaM gaM skaM saM dang brjod pa de dag mig la sogs rnamaso// myong ba mtshan ma de bzhin kho na 'du byed yid brjod pa// rnam snang mdzad sogs bde gshegs dza hUM baM ho khaM raM brjod pas gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs so// laM maM paM taM zhes kyang gsungs pa
52a6(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin spyan la sogs pa'o// bruM aM dz+riM hUM zhes pas rtag la sogs so// oM aHhUM zhes sems 'bar ho'i bar du zhugs pa cho ga bzhin// pad+ma'i nang gnas mnyam med shes rab chags pas zhu ba byed mthong ste// de yi 'od kyi mthu yis kyang
52b1(rgyud 'grel): ni zla bar zhu bar byed mthong ste// 'di ltar spyan la sogs pa'i lha mos dbyangs kyi sgra yis bskul bar bsam// sems can khams na gnas pa'i dbang phyug khyod ni rdo rje'i thugs// dga' ba'i yid 'od don chen 'dod pas bdag la skyabs du
52b2(rgyud 'grel): gsol namagon po gal te de ring bdag ni gsan par mchis bzhed na// sems can yab chen gnyen mchog bdag la bgyes par mdzad du gsol// rdo rje sku khyod bka' yas 'khor lo sems can kun la phan// sangs rgyas don du byang chub
52b3(rgyud 'grel): mchog sgrub rab tu phan par gzigs// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// 'dod chags dam tshig chags pas bdag la dgyes par mdzad du gsol// khyed ni rdo rje'i gsung ste kun la phan pa'i thugs brtse ba//
52b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dag gi dgongs pa'i don mdzad pa la rtag tu brtson// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson por mchis bzhed na// spyod pa dri med kun tu bzang bas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// khyod ni rdo rje'i 'dod pa dam tshig mchog gi
52b5(rgyud 'grel): phan don che// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gdung mchog mnyam pa nyid gzigs pa// mgon po gal te bdag ni de ring gson par mchis bzhed na// yon tan rin chen mang po'i gter gyur bdag la dgyes par mdzod// de ltar dbyangs
52b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis bskul bas sgyu 'phrul dra bar dngos kun legs bsams nas 'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba'i gzhi yi sngags kyis lus su rang bsgyur bya// de la 'od kyis ma lus lha rnams rgyal ba'i thub dbang rnams// nang du thim nas 'od kyis
53a1(rgyud 'grel): dpal ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rjer gyur par bya// gur gum mchog 'od dmar 'dra g.yas g.yon zhal ni gnag dang dkar ba'i mdog/ sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i phyag gnyis dam pa'i shes rab 'khyud// gsal ba'i ral gri mda' dang
53a2(rgyud 'grel): ut+pal mthings gzhu ni mtha' yas 'ong // ma lus rigs rnams 'phro bas brgyan pa'i mkha' kun dkyil 'khor ldan skyob pa// gzung 'dzin bral bas dngos po thams cad ngo bo nyid med shes nas su// rnam par byang ba mngon bzhugs zab don byin brlabs
53a3(rgyud 'grel): 'di ltar bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he/ de 'og gzhi yi sa bon 'od kyis ji ltar rang la gang ste mig sogs rnams// sa snying la sogs dri med rang snying zla ba'i rdo rje bum pa'i dkyil gnas pa// hUM gi thugs kyi rdo rje kha dang mgo la pad+ma
53a4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i dkyil du yang // oM dang phyag mtshan gnyis kyis gsung gi rdo rje sku yi rdo rje 'du bsam par bya// de thugs 'od zer rgyun gyis rang gi shes rab dang sbyor snang bas kun tu ni// rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la mchod nas thugs kyi rdo rje
53a5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs byin gyis brlab// dpal ldan thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// dau ring bdag la byin brlabs nas// thugs kyi rdo rjes mdzod du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed
53a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum bsgoms pas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas// thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dpal ldan chos kyi gsung gi lam// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas//
53b1(rgyud 'grel): gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas// gsung gi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swA b+hA ba At+ma ko ha~M/ dpal ldan
53b2(rgyud 'grel): sku yi rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms pas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs pas// sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// de ring bdag la byin brlabs nas/
53b3(rgyud 'grel): sku yi rdo rjes mdzad du gsol// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma k+Sho hUM/ rdo rje gsum ni na mkha'i rang bzhin mtshan ma spangs pa mtshon byas te// sems kyi 'od zer rnams kyis bskul nas thams cad tshogasu gyur pa'i thub pa'i sde// thub
53b4(rgyud 'grel): mchog 'od zer las byung rig ma tshogs kyi yang drag 'dzin pa yi// bum po'i ye shes chu yis blugs pas rang rig gtso bo snang bas dbu brgyan gyur// de bzhin rang gi lha mo 'dra bar rang gi snying po'ang bsgoms nas rig mar sbrul// mig la sogs
53b5(rgyud 'grel): pa gang nas yig 'bru gsum bkod 'bar ba'i lus ldan ma// 'og snying lte ba gsang ba de bzhin bArla gnyis sogs la de nyid shes par bya// oM hUM swAHAHhA zhes bya bas lus yid rdo rje dam pa'i rigs tshogs kyis// dri lnga'i byin brlabs
53b6(rgyud 'grel): lus ni 'gro gsum khyab pas dam pa'i 'od tshogs bsam// as bskyod rnam par bkod pa'i snying po hUM las sprul pa'i pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// pad+ma'i shes rab rgyu mthun rang bzhin thabs dang bcas par gyur pa yi gzhi'i lus bsngags pa//
54a1(rgyud 'grel): de dang lhan cig bde gshegs rnams la rjes su chags par bAg+h+ri zhes brtsams// oM sarba ta thA gA tA a nu rA ga nu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kro haM/ sems kyi zla ba'i 'od kyis ma lus sangs rgyas tshogs ni bzhugs gnas te/ hUM
54a2(rgyud 'grel): gi rdo rjer byung nas dri med pad+ma la gnas dam pa'i yid kyi gzugs// bsams nas rang gi snying pos bskyed pa thams cad gzhi yi dkyil 'khor lha gzugasu// cho ga 'di yi sems ni brtan po dang zhes pa nas rA ga rA ti zhes bya yum mchog na//
54a3(rgyud 'grel): mchog gi rjesu dkar mo zhes par mtha' yas yon tan rin chen ma// rin chen dbang phyug dra ba'i dngos po sgrol ba badz+ra rA ti zhes bskul bsdu// dri med rin chen phreng bas bsgoms pa'i phyogs 'khor byed ma dbang ldan la// dam pa'i 'khor
54a4(rgyud 'grel): lo ut+pal dmar po pad+ma ut+pal ser po rnams kyis mtshan// de dag gi ni rim pa'i nges pa'i lhag ma'i ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyag bsnams yin// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi dang ni shar gyi sgo gnyis la ni bsam bya ba// gzugs sogs rdo rje
54a5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo sku la sogs dang gsum gyis so// shar gyi sgo ru grags pa bsam pa thams cad 'grub mtha' yas pas 'jigs pa'i 'od// 'bar la ya man+ta krita ces pas zad dus drag sprin dkyil 'khor dngos po ste// thugs badrag rgyal po
54a6(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i sku ni du ma'i khro bo rigs kyi 'od phyung ba// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya mi bzad pa'i sbrul gyis sku brgyan dpal ldan pa'o// lho phyogs kyi sgor gnas pa pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ces pas bla na med ldan pa// sku yi dbang phyug bzhin du phyag la
54b1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa drag po gzhan gyis mi thub gsal// de nas rta mgrin nub kyi phyogs kyi sgo ru 'od zer 'khrigs pas phyogs bskor ba// pad+ma nA kr-ita ces pas 'bar ba'i 'jigs pa'i me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gsung gi bzhin du phyag la
54b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa du mas sdang ba 'jigs byed zhal// gang sgrogs bzhad pas ri rnams g.yo bar byed dang thub pa'i dbong rnams so// de nas mi bskyod 'dra ba'i zhal sogs big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita ces bya byung sgo ru// zad du khyin zla lta bu 'phags pa bdud rtsi
54b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khyil pa dpa' ba'o// rnam snang mdzad dang thub dbang snang ba mtha' yas thugs kyi dbang phyug dbu rgyan dang // rim par tho ba be con pad+ma rdo rje la sogs phyag kyang de bzhin no// de ltar rdzogs par bskyed par dkyil 'khor mthong nas dngos/
54b4(rgyud 'grel): bo thams cad kyis// snying po sngags kyi 'od zer lcags kyusu bde gshegs spyan drangs bsgom par bya// thabs dang shes rab dngos po dri med ting 'dzin las byung dam pa'i bde bas gsung bar ni// dkyil 'khor bsams te de nas mthar byed
54b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bsrung byas nas// rang snying bzlas pa'i dam pa'i tsan ngan sogs dang me tog mdzes pa phul te thim// rang dang 'dra ba'i cho gas dbang bskur byas nas 'di ltar nan tan mchod par bya// pad+ma'i nang gi rang gi sa bon 'od kyis drangs
54b6(rgyud 'grel): nas gzugs thams cad ni// pad+ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor yang dag byang chub yid kyi sa bon bsam par bya// shes rab so so'i ba spu las byung sna tshogs rnam pa'i 'od zer rgyas pa'i tshogs// ma lus khyab pa'i mkha' gzhi thams cad de
55a1(rgyud 'grel): nas blo dang ldan pas spro bar bya// 'od zer sgo nas byung ba'i dri med thams cad rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan sku dang // me long pi wang dri dang ro yi snod dang na bza' chos 'byung la sogs dang // mtshan ma rnams kyi rim pas mdzes pas
55a2(rgyud 'grel): ldem bag phyag ni lo ma 'od dang bcas// gsal ba'i 'od zer sprul pa mang po sna tshogs mchod pa'i sprin gyi dra ba rnams 'byung dang // sgyu ma la sogs dra ba'i dngos po so so yang dag rig pa'i 'jig rten lta dge dang // rtog pa thams cad nges
55a3(rgyud 'grel): grol mchog gi bde ba 'byung rgyu'i dngos ldan pa'i// gzugs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams kyis de bzhin phyi ma'i dri sogs thams cad kyis// dbye ba'i rtog pa grol bas rgyal ba'i dbang po rnams la yang dag mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga
55a4(rgyud 'grel): ta pU dzaM badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de yi 'og tu sgra brnyan 'dra bar sgra yul thams cad la nI yongs bsams na// rang yid rig pa'i lha yi bstod pa'i sgra dang ldan pa'i chos rnams zhes su gsungs// gzugs la sogs pa gcig min rdul
55a5(rgyud 'grel): phran cha yang ma mthong du ma'i gzugs kyang ma yin zhes pa'ang de bzhin no// yan lag med pa'i rdul phran nyid la du ma'i rdul phra rab kyis rjes 'brang med phyir dang // sa yi dkyil 'khor la sogs gzugs kyi dbye bas de la 'ga' yang mi 'gyur ro// /
55a6(rgyud 'grel): de bas 'dzin pa la sogs bral bas rang dbang gzugs la sogs pa kun brtags ngo bo yin// ma lus g.yo dang mi g.yo'i dngos po dri za'i grong khyer dag dang 'dra ba yin// bdag gir 'dzin pa'i rgyun gyi ngo bos 'khor ba 'di dag ste// dag pa
55b1(rgyud 'grel): yang ni de las ldog pa'i ngo bo tsam la rnam par shes par bya// chos nyid kyis ni srid dang zhi ba'i ngo bo 'dir ni dbye ba 'gar yang med// ci'i phyir 'dzin pa la sogs rnam par bral ba rtag tu kun la sgrub pa'i phyir// thams cad 'ga' yang med de so so
55b2(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'i rang bzhin rtog pa las// sems las gzhan du gyur pa'i nga zhes 'ga' yang med de de phyir bdag kyang de// gang gi ngo bo gang yin de yi de nyid rtogs pa'i gzhi ste ci phyir dngos// de bas thams cad dbyer med shes te dngos po thams
55b3(rgyud 'grel): cing dbyer med pa nyid yin// kha cig yul dang kha cig gzhan du snang bar rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pa gang zhig gis// de dang de yi bral dang bral ba'i phyis te de phyis thams cad ma yin no// dad dang brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa de bzhin
55b4(rgyud 'grel): dran pa bsam gtan dag pas kyang // dam pa'i sgo srung gzugs te shes rab rnam par dag pas thams cad yul du snang // mtshan ma med pa'i dag pa thams cad dag pas lha mo tshogs kyi rang bzhin dang // thams cad don dang bdag po rnam par
55b5(rgyud 'grel): rtog pa rab tu 'jug pa rnam par dag pa yis// me long la sogs mkha' chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' ba che// rang bzhin gyi ni
